objectClass.name: ORG_Root
objectClass.semantics: The object class for all NETN-ORG object classes

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: Required. A unique name.

objectClass.name: OrganizationElement
objectClass.semantics: An object class for all NETN-ORG organizational elements

attribute.name: Organization
attribute.semantics: Required: A reference to the organization the element is affiliated with.

attribute.name: SuperiorUnit
attribute.semantics: Required: A reference to a unit within the organization for which this element is a subunit/equipment or controlled installation. The default value is all zeros (no aggregate unit).

attribute.name: EntityType
attribute.semantics: Required. SISO-REF-010 code for entity type definitions. If unknown, use 0.0.0.0.0.0.0.

attribute.name: Symbol
attribute.semantics: Required. Initial symbol identifier and amplification data for this element. In NETN-ORG the symbol identifier acts as a template and may contain wildcard characters '*' to indicate undefined elements of the symbol code.

attribute.name: Location
attribute.semantics: Optional. The geographic location of the element. Required if no `HostUnit` is provided. This represents the initial location in the scenario unless otherwise modelled in the simulation.

attribute.name: HostUnit
attribute.semantics: Optional. A reference to a unit or equipment controlling the movement or operating an installation. E.g. a unit embarked on a transport, or a helicopter on a ship. The default value is all zeros, indicating that the unit is not embarked in or mounted on any other unit or equipment. Not applicable to `Installation`.

objectClass.name: Equipment
objectClass.semantics: An equipment represents individual physical items defined specifically and apart from any holdings defined for the `HostUnit`. Equipment includes platforms, munition and sensors object.

attribute.name: CommunicationNetworks
attribute.semantics: Optional: A list of communication networks available for the unit.

objectClass.name: AIS_Equipment
objectClass.semantics: This class defines additional attributes for AIS equipment. Depending on the kind of AIS equipment, further attributes are added in sub-classes.

attribute.name: MMSI
attribute.semantics: Optional. The MMSI number (Maritime Mobile Service Identity) of the AIS station. If the value is not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the AIS station shall generate a value. Note that the value of each AIS station must be unique across all AIS stations in the simulation. Reuse of MMSI numbers if not advised since some systems may retain dead tracks for some time.

attribute.name: Callsign
attribute.semantics: Optional. The callsign of the AIS Station (typically a vessel). The callsign prefix should be in accordance with ITU recommendation for call sign allocation. See https://www.itu.int/en/ITU-R/terrestrial/fmd/Pages/call_sign_series.aspx.

attribute.name: TransmitterStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional. The initial status of the AIS Transmitter(s) of the AIS station. If the value is not provided then the value shall be assumed to be ON.

attribute.name: RadioSystemType
attribute.semantics: Optional. The type of transmitter. If the value is not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the AIS station shall determine the type of transmitter.

objectClass.name: Vessel
objectClass.semantics: This class defines additional attributes for vessel equipment.

attribute.name: IMO
attribute.semantics: Optional. The International Maritime Organization (IMO) number to identify the vessel. If the value is not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the vessel shall generate a value.

attribute.name: ShipType
attribute.semantics: Optional. The type of vessel.

attribute.name: DimensionToStern
attribute.semantics: Optional. Distance in meters to stern, in accordance with ITU-R M.1371-5 (02/2014).

attribute.name: DimensionToBow
attribute.semantics: Optional. Distance in meters to bow, in accordance with ITU-R M.1371-5 (02/2014).

attribute.name: DimensionToPort
attribute.semantics: Optional. Distance in meters to port, in accordance with ITU-R M.1371-5 (02/2014).

attribute.name: DimensionToStarboard
attribute.semantics: Optional. Distance in meters to starboard, in accordance with ITU-R M.1371-5 (02/2014).

attribute.name: Draught
attribute.semantics: Optional. Draught, in accordance with ITU-R M.1371-5 (02/2014).

objectClass.name: SARaircraft
objectClass.semantics: This class defines additional attributes for SAR aircraft equipment.

objectClass.name: Basestation
objectClass.semantics: This class defines additional attributes for basestation equipment.

objectClass.name: AidToNavigation
objectClass.semantics: This class defines additional attributes for aid to navigation (ATON) equipment.

attribute.name: AidType
attribute.semantics: Optional. Type of AtoN.

attribute.name: DimensionToStern
attribute.semantics: Optional. Distance in meters to stern, in accordance with ITU-R M.1371-5 (02/2014).

attribute.name: DimensionToBow
attribute.semantics: Optional. Distance in meters to bow, in accordance with ITU-R M.1371-5 (02/2014).

attribute.name: DimensionToPort
attribute.semantics: Optional. Distance in meters to port, in accordance with ITU-R M.1371-5 (02/2014).

attribute.name: DimensionToStarboard
attribute.semantics: Optional. Distance in meters to starboard, in accordance with ITU-R M.1371-5 (02/2014).

objectClass.name: Unit
objectClass.semantics: A unit represents an element at a specified level in the organization. An organizational unit can contain subunits and can belong to a superior unit. A unit consists of equipment, personnel and supplies; these holdings can belong directly to the unit or indirectly as a holding of a subunit.

attribute.name: CommunicationNetworks
attribute.semantics: Optional: A list of communication networks available for the unit.

attribute.name: HigherHeadquarters
attribute.semantics: Optional. A reference to a unit representing the superior headquarters. The default value is all zeros (no higher headquarters).

attribute.name: Echelon
attribute.semantics: Optional. Symbol modifier identifying the command level. Default NONE.

attribute.name: IsHq
attribute.semantics: Optional. Indicate whether the unit has a command function, e.g. if it is an HQ or not. The default is FALSE, no HQ.

attribute.name: Holdings
attribute.semantics: Optional. A set of holdings defined for this unit in addition to holdings defined for all subunits and any specific `Equipment` objects with this unit as `HostUnit . The default is an empty list.`

attribute.name: Formation
attribute.semantics: Optional. Formation of this unit.

objectClass.name: Installation
objectClass.semantics: Installations are facilities, e.g. harbours, airfields, or engineering objects, e.g. minefields.

objectClass.name: Organization
objectClass.semantics: An organization have relationships with other organizations. Units belonging to different organizations have the same relationship as the organizations they belong to. However, the relationships between organizations can be asymmetrical, e.g. Side A can be hostile to B while B is neutral to A. Furthermore, the relation may change during a federation execution.

attribute.name: Relationships
attribute.semantics: Optional. The relations with other organizations. The federation agreements specify default relationship.

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Required: A force identifier indicate a special relationship with an organization in the scenario designated as the default perspective of the scenario. The force identifier applies to all simulated entities representing an organizational element belonging to the organization and is a required attribute for all `PhysicalEntity` and `AggregateEntity` objects in the federation.

attribute.name: CountryCode
attribute.semantics: Optional: Numerical country code based on ISO 3166-1 numeric. The numeric codes 900 to 999 can be user-assigned in the federation agreement.

objectClass.name: BaseEntity
objectClass.semantics: A base class of aggregate and discrete scenario domain participants. The BaseEntity class is characterized by being located at a particular location in space and independently movable, if capable of movement at all. It specifically excludes elements normally considered to be a component of another element. The BaseEntity class is intended to be a container for common attributes for entities of this type. Since it lacks sufficient class specific attributes that are required for simulation purposes, federates cannot publish objects of this class. Certain simulation management federates, e.g. viewers, may subscribe to this class. Simulation federates will normally subscribe to one of the subclasses, to gain the extra information required to properly simulate the entity.

attribute.name: IncomingConnections
attribute.semantics: Optional. All incoming communication connections to the receiving simulated entity. Any messages sent on a CommunicationNetwork with a Connection of sufficient quality should be received by this entity and processed if the entity is the intended recipient.

attribute.name: Callsign
attribute.semantics: Optional: The callsign is a unique-designator. Use the RPR-FOM `PhysicalEntity` attribute `Marking` or the `AggregateEntity` attribute `AggregateMarking` as default value. Max length 21 characters.

attribute.name: Symbol
attribute.semantics: Optional. A symbol identifier and additional amplification. Derive default value based on `EntityType`.

attribute.name: HostEntity
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to the simulation entity this platform is mounted on or embedded in. Default is all zeros.

attribute.name: ProtectionLevel
attribute.semantics: Optional. An entity's additional level of protection against the effects of weapons fire. E.g., cover, fortification, etc. Default is 0 = fully affected by weapon fire.

attribute.name: Signatures
attribute.semantics: Optional: A set of signatures to characterize this entity's susceptibility to detection. Default is No Signatures = Empty.

attribute.name: Sensors
attribute.semantics: Optional: A set of sensors associated with the entity. Default is No sensors = Empty.

attribute.name: CaptureStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional: The status of an entity's level of control or influence over its activities. The Default is 0 = Other.

attribute.name: CurrentTasks
attribute.semantics: Optional. An array of currently executing tasks.

attribute.name: TaskProgress
attribute.semantics: Optional. An array of progress for current tasks.

attribute.name: PlannedTasks
attribute.semantics: Optional. An array of all planned tasks.

attribute.name: PreviousTasks
attribute.semantics: Optional. An array of completed or cancelled tasks.

attribute.name: Status
attribute.semantics: Optional. Indicates if this entity is currently being simulated or not. During an inactive state, the attribute values may not reflect accurate or current values. All attributes are updated to represent the current status of the object instance before setting the state to Active. The default is `Active`.

attribute.name: SourceAggregate
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to an active `AggregateEnity` instance which is the source of a NETN-MRM division. The default value is all zeros representing no source AggregateEntity.

attribute.name: ParentAggregate
attribute.semantics: Optional. If this simulation entity results from a disaggregation, this attribute refers to the disaggregated `AggregateEntity`. The default value is no reference, i.e. all zeros.

attribute.name: OrganizationElement
attribute.semantics: Optional: Reference to an existing NETN-ORG organization element, e.g. a `Unit` or `Equipment` represented by this simulation entity. The default value is no related organization element, i.e. all zeros.

attribute.name: Organization
attribute.semantics: Optional: The organization in the scenario this entity belongs to.

attribute.name: SupportedActions
attribute.semantics: Optional: Indicates what control actions are supported by an individual simulated entity.

attribute.name: EntityType
attribute.semantics: The category of the entity.

attribute.name: EntityIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The unique identifier for the entity instance.

attribute.name: IsPartOf
attribute.semantics: Defines if the entity if a constituent part of another entity (denoted the host entity). If the entity is a constituent part of another entity then the HostEntityIdentifier shall be set to the EntityIdentifier of the host entity and the HostRTIObjectIdentifier shall be set to the RTI object instance ID of the host entity. If the entity is not a constituent part of another entity then the HostEntityIdentifier shall be set to 0.0.0 and the HostRTIObjectIdentifier shall be set to the empty string.

attribute.name: Spatial
attribute.semantics: Spatial state stored in one variant record attribute.

attribute.name: RelativeSpatial
attribute.semantics: Relative spatial state stored in one variant record attribute.

objectClass.name: PhysicalEntity
objectClass.semantics: A base class of all discrete platform scenario domain participants.

attribute.name: AcousticSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the acoustics (sound through air) signature state of the entity.

attribute.name: AlternateEntityType
attribute.semantics: The category of entity to be used when viewed by entities on the 'opposite' side.

attribute.name: ArticulatedParametersArray
attribute.semantics: Identification of the visible parts, and their states, of the entity which are capable of independent motion.

attribute.name: CamouflageType
attribute.semantics: The type of camouflage in use (if any).

attribute.name: DamageState
attribute.semantics: The state of damage of the entity.

attribute.name: EngineSmokeOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's engine is generating smoke or not.

attribute.name: FirePowerDisabled
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's main weapon system has been disabled or not.

attribute.name: FlamesPresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is on fire (with visible flames) or not.

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the force that the entity belongs to.

attribute.name: HasAmmunitionSupplyCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to supply other entities with ammunition.

attribute.name: HasFuelSupplyCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to supply other entities with fuel or not.

attribute.name: HasRecoveryCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to recover other entities or not.

attribute.name: HasRepairCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to repair other entities or not.

attribute.name: Immobilized
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is immobilized or not.

attribute.name: InfraredSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the infra-red signature state of the entity.

attribute.name: IsConcealed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is concealed or not.

attribute.name: LiveEntityMeasuredSpeed
attribute.semantics: The entity's own measurement of speed (e.g. air speed for aircraft).

attribute.name: Marking
attribute.semantics: A unique marking or combination of characters used to distinguish the entity from other entities.

attribute.name: PowerPlantOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's power plant is on or not.

attribute.name: PropulsionSystemsData
attribute.semantics: The basic operating data of the propulsion systems aboard the entity.

attribute.name: RadarCrossSectionSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the radar cross section signature state of the entity.

attribute.name: SmokePlumePresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is generating smoke or not (intentional or unintentional).

attribute.name: TentDeployed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has deployed tent or not.

attribute.name: TrailingEffectsCode
attribute.semantics: The type and size of any trail that the entity is making.

attribute.name: VectoringNozzleSystemData
attribute.semantics: The basic operational data for the vectoring nozzle systems aboard the entity.

objectClass.name: Lifeform
objectClass.semantics: A living military platform (human or not).

attribute.name: FlashLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the lifeform's flash lights are on or not.

attribute.name: StanceCode
attribute.semantics: The stance of the lifeform.

attribute.name: PrimaryWeaponState
attribute.semantics: The state of the soldier's primary weapon system.

attribute.name: SecondaryWeaponState
attribute.semantics: The state of the soldier's secondary weapon system.

attribute.name: ComplianceState
attribute.semantics: The compliance of the lifeform.

objectClass.name: Human
objectClass.semantics: A human lifeform.

attribute.name: Exposures
attribute.semantics: Array of agents to which this entity has been exposed to. Defaults to an empty array.

attribute.name: Treatments
attribute.semantics: The types of treatment that this entity has used. Defaults to an empty array.

attribute.name: TriageLevel
attribute.semantics: Triage level of this entity. Defaults to Uninjured.

attribute.name: IPEType
attribute.semantics: Type of IPE that the entity is using. Defaults to None.

objectClass.name: NonHuman
objectClass.semantics: An animal or other non-human lifeform.

objectClass.name: Sensor
objectClass.semantics: Sensors and emitters, such as stand-alone radars, jammers, and detection systems, that are not part of another platform or system described by another Physical Entity, and are operated by armed forces.

attribute.name: AntennaRaised
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's antenna is raised or not.

attribute.name: BlackoutLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's blackout lights are on or not.

attribute.name: LightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's lights are on or not.

attribute.name: InteriorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's interior lights are on or not.

attribute.name: MissionKill
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter has sustained damage that will prevent it carrying out its mission or not (e.g. damaged antenna).

objectClass.name: CBRN_Detector
objectClass.semantics: Represents a CBRN detector. This object is used to pass information to a CBRN federate, which will model the detector internally and publish a CBRN_DetectorAlarm.

attribute.name: ProcessingTime
attribute.semantics: Duration between the detector being exposed to a concentration of agent above its threshold and the detector raising an alarm.

attribute.name: AveragingTime
attribute.semantics: Duration the detector will collect samples.

attribute.name: DetectableAgents
attribute.semantics: Array of detectable agents and their thresholds.

attribute.name: Alarm
attribute.semantics: Data representing the alarm of this detector. Defaults to no alarm if the attribute is not set.

objectClass.name: CBRN_Sensor
objectClass.semantics: Represents a CBRN sensor. This object is used to pass information to a CBRN federate, which will return sensor readings by publishing CBRN_SensorUpdate interactions.

attribute.name: UpdateFrequency
attribute.semantics: Duration that this sensor would like between updated readings.

attribute.name: AveragingTime
attribute.semantics: Duration the sensor will collect samples.

attribute.name: DetectableAgents
attribute.semantics: Array of agents that this sensor wishes to detect.

attribute.name: SensorReadings
attribute.semantics: Latest sensor readings. Defaults to no readings if this attribute is not set.

objectClass.name: Platform
objectClass.semantics: A physical object under the control of armed forces upon which sensor, communication, or weapon systems may be mounted.

attribute.name: Contamination
attribute.semantics: CBRN hazardous agent inside vehicle due to embedded units.

attribute.name: AfterburnerOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's afterburner is on or not.

attribute.name: AntiCollisionLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's anti-collision lights are on or not.

attribute.name: BlackOutBrakeLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's black out brake lights are on or not.

attribute.name: BlackOutLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's black out lights are on or not.

attribute.name: BrakeLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's brake lights are on or not.

attribute.name: FormationLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's formation lights are on or not.

attribute.name: HatchState
attribute.semantics: The state of the entity's (main) hatch.

attribute.name: HeadLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's headlights are on or not.

attribute.notes: RPRnotePhysical3 RPRnotePhysical10 RPRnotePhysical11 RPRnotePhysical12 RPRnotePhysical13 RPRnotePhysical15
attribute.name: InteriorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's internal lights are on or not.

attribute.name: LandingLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's landing lights are on or not.

attribute.name: LauncherRaised
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's weapon launcher is in the raised position.

attribute.name: NavigationLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's navigation lights are on or not.

attribute.name: RampDeployed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has deployed a ramp or not.

attribute.name: RunningLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's running lights are on or not.

attribute.notes: RPRnotePhysical3 RPRnotePhysical10 RPRnotePhysical11 RPRnotePhysical12 RPRnotePhysical13 RPRnotePhysical15
attribute.name: SpotLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's spotlights are on or not.

attribute.name: TailLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's tail lights are on or not.

objectClass.name: Aircraft
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates mainly in the air, such as aircraft, balloons, etc. This includes the entities when they are on the ground.

attribute.name: AntiCollisionLightsDayNight
attribute.semantics: Optional: Describes the day/night status of the Anti-Collision lights. Default Day=0.

attribute.name: AntiCollisionLightsFlashing
attribute.semantics: Optional: Anti collision light flashing state. Default Steady=0.

attribute.name: FormationLightsLuminance
attribute.semantics: Optional: Formation lights luminance level. Default = 0.

attribute.name: NavigationLightsFlashing
attribute.semantics: Optional: Navigation lights flashing state. Default Steady=0.

attribute.name: NVGMode
attribute.semantics: Optional: Describes whether air platform lighting is in covert or overt mode. Default Overt_Lighting = 0.

attribute.name: TaxiwayLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entity's taxiway lights are on or not. Default False=0.

attribute.name: HDULightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional. Whether the HDU Lights are on or not. Hose Drogue Unit (HDU) Lights are used during air-to-air refueling. Default False = 0.

attribute.name: IndicatedAirspeed
attribute.semantics: Optional: The indicated air speed of the aircraft. Default 2.6 m/s

attribute.name: TrueAirspeed
attribute.semantics: Optional: The true air speed of the aircraft. Default = 2.6 m/s

attribute.name: MachNumber
attribute.semantics: Optional: The speed of the aircraft measured in Mach number. Default = 0.1

attribute.name: WeightOnWheels
attribute.semantics: Optional: Describes whether the air platform has weight on its main landing gear. Default True = 1.

objectClass.name: TankerAircraft
objectClass.semantics: A tanker aircraft.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation1LightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the refueling station lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation1LightsColor
attribute.semantics: Optional: Color of the refueling station lights. Default Red = 0.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation1LightsFlashing
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the refueling station lights are flashing. Default Steady = False.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation1DayNight
attribute.semantics: Optional: Describes the day/night status of the refueling station lights. Default Day = 0.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation2LightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the refueling station lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation2LightsColor
attribute.semantics: Optional: Color of the refueling station lights. Default Red = 0.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation2LightsFlashing
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the refueling station lights are flashing. Default Steady = False.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation2DayNight
attribute.semantics: Optional: Describes the day/night status of the refueling station lights. Default Day = 0.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation3LightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the refueling station lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation3LightsColor
attribute.semantics: Optional: Color of the refueling station lights. Default Red = 0.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation3LightsFlashing
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the refueling station lights are flashing. Default Steady = False.

attribute.name: RefuelingStation3DayNight
attribute.semantics: Optional: Describes the day/night status of the refueling station lights. Default Day = 0.

objectClass.name: GroundVehicle
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates wholly on the surface of the earth.

attribute.name: EmergencyLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entity's emergency lights are on or not. A value of true, indicating that the lights are on, means that the lights begin flashing in accordance with the duty cylce of the model. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: LeftIndicatorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entity's left front and left rear indicator lights are on or not. A value of true, indicating that the lights are on, means that the lights begin flashing in accordance with the duty cylce of the model. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: RightIndicatorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entity's right front and right rear indicator lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

objectClass.name: SurfaceVessel
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates wholly on the surface of the sea.

attribute.name: AnchorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys anchor lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: WarningLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys warning/safety lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: DistressBeaconOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys distress beacon is on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: FlightDeckLights
attribute.semantics: Optional: Indicates the intensity level of the Flight Deck Lights. A value of 0 means the light is off, while a value of 100 means the light is on at full power. Default = 0.

attribute.name: UpperDeckFloodLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys upper deck flood lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: UpperDeckLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys upper deck lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: HorizonBarLights
attribute.semantics: Optional: Indicates the intensity level of the Horizon Bar Lights. A value of 0 means the light is off, while a value of 100 means the light is on at full power. Default = 0.

attribute.name: GlidePathIndicatorBeam
attribute.semantics: Optional: Indicates the intensity level of the GlidePathIndicatorBeam. A value of 0 means the light is off, while a value of 100 means the light is on at full power. Default = 0.

attribute.name: WaveOffLightOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys wave off light is on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: NotUnderCommandLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys Not Under Command lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: RAMLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys Restricted Ability To Manuever (RAM) lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: FishingWithLinesLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys fishing lights with lines are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: FishingWithNetsLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys fishing lights with nets are on or not. Default Off = False.

attribute.name: MineHuntingLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Optional: Whether the entitys mine hunting lights are on or not. Default Off = False.

objectClass.name: AmphibiousVehicle
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that can operate both on the land and the sea.

objectClass.name: MultiDomainPlatform
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates in more than one domain (excluding those combinations explicitly defined as subclasses of the superclass of this class).

objectClass.name: Spacecraft
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates mainly in space.

objectClass.name: SubmersibleVessel
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates either on the surface of the sea, or beneath it.

objectClass.name: CulturalFeature
objectClass.semantics: Engineering and natural effects such as craters, bridges, vehicle tracks, etc.

attribute.name: Capacity
attribute.semantics: Required: The number of entities that this cultural feature can handle.

attribute.name: ExternalLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature's external lights are on or not.

attribute.name: InternalHeatSourceOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature's internal heat source is on or not.

attribute.name: InternalLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature's internal lights are on or not.

objectClass.name: COLPRO
objectClass.semantics: Represents a feature that provides Collective Protection (COLPRO) against a CBRN threat.

attribute.name: Protection
attribute.semantics: The effectiveness that this COLPRO offers for each agent.

objectClass.name: DecontaminationStation
objectClass.semantics: Represents a feature that provides treatment for CBRN exposure.

attribute.name: DecontaminationPeriod
attribute.semantics: Required: Duration it takes to decontaminate an entity.

attribute.name: Treatments
attribute.semantics: Required: The types of treatment that this decontamination station currently offers.

objectClass.name: Munition
objectClass.semantics: A complete device charged with explosives, propellants, pyrotechnics, initiating composition, or nuclear, biological or chemical material for use in military operations, including demolitions.

attribute.name: LauncherFlashPresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the flash of the munition being launched is present or not.

objectClass.name: Expendables
objectClass.semantics: Countermeasures devices that are dispensed from another entity. The devices may be active emitters or passive reflectors of energy.

objectClass.name: Radio
objectClass.semantics: Electronic devices for the communication of both audio and data, operated by entities belonging to armed forces.

objectClass.name: Supplies
objectClass.semantics: Supplies other than munitions, such as fuel, food and personnel.

objectClass.name: AggregateEntity
objectClass.semantics: A group of one or more separate objects that operate together as part of an organization. These objects may be discrete, may be other aggregate objects, or may be a mixture of both.

attribute.name: Echelon
attribute.semantics: Optional. Use the echelon symbol-modifier to specify the size of the AggregateEntity (level of command). Derive default value based on `EntityType`.

attribute.name: CombatValue
attribute.semantics: Optional. A summary value of the effectiveness (the level of training, leadership, morale, personnel and equipment operational status). Default is 100%.

attribute.name: WeaponsControlOrder
attribute.semantics: Optional. Describes current Weapon Control Order as Free, Tight, or Hold. Default is 0 = Other.

attribute.name: Supplies
attribute.semantics: Required. The type and total quantities of supply holdings modelled by this entity.

attribute.name: Equipment
attribute.semantics: Required. The total amount and status of equipment holdings represented by this entity.

attribute.name: Personnel
attribute.semantics: Required. The total amount and status of all personnel holdings modelled by this entity.

attribute.name: DividedEntities
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to other aggregate or physical entities divided from the `AggregateEntity` to represent specific subsets of holdings.

attribute.name: DisaggregatedEntities
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to the disaggregated entities after disaggregation of this `AggregateEntity`. Each element should refer to an existing entity in the federation. The `Status` of this `AggregateEntity` shall be inactive if disaggregated entities exist.|

attribute.name: AggregateMarking
attribute.semantics: A unique marking or combination of characters used to distinguish the aggregate from other aggregates.

attribute.name: AggregateState
attribute.semantics: An indicator of the extent of association of objects form an operating group.

attribute.name: Dimensions
attribute.semantics: The size of the area covered by the units in the aggregate.

attribute.name: EntityIdentifiers
attribute.semantics: The identification of entities that are contained within the aggregate.

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the force that the aggregate belongs to.

attribute.name: Formation
attribute.semantics: The category of positional arrangement of the entities within the aggregate.

attribute.name: NumberOfSilentEntities
attribute.semantics: The number of elements in the SilentEntities list.

attribute.name: NumberOfVariableDatums
attribute.semantics: The number of records in the VariableDatums structure.

attribute.name: SilentAggregates
attribute.semantics: The numbers and types, of silent aggregates contained in the aggregate. Silent aggregates are sub-aggregates that are in the aggregate, but that are not separately represented in the virtual world.

attribute.name: SilentEntities
attribute.semantics: The numbers and types, of silent entities in the aggregate. Silent entities are entities that are in the aggregate, but that are not separately represented in the virtual world.

attribute.name: SubAggregateIdentifiers
attribute.semantics: The identifications of aggregates represented in the virtual world that are contained in the aggregate.

attribute.name: VariableDatums
attribute.semantics: Extra data that describes the aggregate.

objectClass.name: EnvironmentalEntity
objectClass.semantics: An object which has physical extent but not necessarily fixed size and shape, such as meteorological effects such as clouds or smokes.

attribute.name: OpacityCode
attribute.semantics: Specifies the density of an environmental entity

objectClass.name: DIM_HazardRegion
objectClass.semantics: Use the `DIM_HazardRegion` object to represent a hazard in a synthetic environment.

attribute.name: Area
attribute.semantics: Required: Geographical boundary of the HazardRegion.

objectClass.name: CBRN_Hazard
objectClass.semantics: A generic representation of a CBRN Hazard.

attribute.name: AgentType
attribute.semantics: Requierd: Agent reflected in this contour.

attribute.name: Contours
attribute.semantics: Optional: Array of contours. These should be ordered in a sequence of ascending PercentProbabilityLevel.

attribute.name: ExposureType
attribute.semantics: Optional: The type of exposure.

attribute.name: HazardType
attribute.semantics: Type of hazard.

objectClass.name: CBRN_Hazard_Prediction
objectClass.semantics: Represents the footprint generated by a CBRN warning and reporting simulation. This follows the NATO ATP-45 doctrine to generate a hazard area.

attribute.name: Duration
attribute.semantics: Duration that this hazard prediction is valid.

attribute.name: ATP45HazardAreaType
attribute.semantics: This hazard area's type

attribute.name: AgentClass
attribute.semantics: The agent class

objectClass.name: Flooding
objectClass.semantics: Representation of a flooded area.

attribute.name: Level
attribute.semantics: Required: FloodingLevel represents the water level of the flooding relative to the Mean Sea Level (MSL).

attribute.name: LevelChange
attribute.semantics: Optional: The water level change over time.

objectClass.name: Wildfire
objectClass.semantics: Use the `Wildfire` object to represent a wildfire that may spread.

attribute.name: FrontWidth
attribute.semantics: Required: Indicates the thickness of the actual fire ring surrounding a no longer burning region. The assumption is that a fire starts at one or more locations and then spreads in a circular shape with a fire front of a certain thickness and burnt land behind the front line. The Area attribute defines the outer boundary of the overall region, and the front of the flames is assumed to extend from the boundary into the region.

attribute.name: FrontVelocity
attribute.semantics: Optional: The spread velocity of the front line. The Default = 0.

attribute.name: Temperature
attribute.semantics: Optional: The temperature in the front line.

objectClass.name: EarthquakeArea
objectClass.semantics: Use the `EarhquakeArea` object to represent an area affected by an earthquake.

attribute.name: Magnitude
attribute.semantics: Required: Richter magnitude scale.

objectClass.name: Landslide
objectClass.semantics: Use the `Landslide` object to represent a landslide area covered by mud, snow or gravel.

attribute.name: Thickness
attribute.semantics: Required: Thickness in meter.

attribute.name: LandslideType
attribute.semantics: Optional: The type of landslide material. Default = 0.

objectClass.name: COM_Root
objectClass.semantics: Abstract root class for all NETN-COM objects.

objectClass.name: CommunicationNetwork
objectClass.semantics: The `CommunicationNetwork` class specifies details about the type of service used by a logical communication network. This corresponds to the CommunicationNet-Elements of MSDL Units and Equipments. Instances of this object class should be considered optional. No federate should rely on this data to work with communication networks.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: Required. Communication network name. Unique in the context of communication networks.

attribute.name: NetworkType
attribute.semantics: Optional. The communication network type of use.

attribute.name: ServiceType
attribute.semantics: Optional. The type of service used on the communication network.

objectClass.name: CommunicationNode
objectClass.semantics:
A `CommunicationNode` is the representation of the interface of a simulated entity to logical communication networks. The location of the `CommunicationNode` is derived from the referenced entity or specified explicitly (if the referenced entity is not registered in the federation).
Each potential connection is described in terms of requested connections (the equivalent to the information provided by MSDL). `Connection` objects represent the availability of a connection and its receivers. It is up to a communication simulation to create `Connection` objects for the requested connections based on the network devices of the `CommunicationNode`, the physical network and the link quality between network devices. Depending on the federation design and agreements, the explicit representation of the physical layer objects, `PhysicalNetwork` and `LinkStates`, is optional.
A requested connection is used to describe the characteristics of a possible connection to a communication network. For the types of connections where data is intended to be transmitted, a connection identifier can be provided that can be used to create a `Connection` object instance.
Unless a network device is explicitly specified, all suitable devices associated with the communication network of the requested connection shall be used.
Depending on the type of the requested connection the use of the associated network device parameters differs:
* **Broadcast Transceiver**: A combination of Broadcast Transmitter and Receiver * **Broadcast Transmitter**: * If TX is specified for a network device, connections are established to all receiving entities reachable depending on the physical network description (ranges, max hops, etc.). Data is sent to all (directly linked) receivers simultaneously. * A Connection instance should be created. * The DestinationEntityArray is ignored. * **Broadcast Receiver**: * If RX is specified for a network device, the connections listen to all incoming messages. * The DestinationEntityArray is ignored. * **Peer-To-Peer**: * If TX is specified for a network device connections are established to all reachable specified destination entities. * If RX is specified for a network device, the connections listen to all incoming messages which are sent to the entity. * It is assumed that the communication is bidirectional and should use the same route in both directions. The connection must be defined at the receiver as well. * If DestinationEntityArray is empty messages will be sent to all reachable participants of the communication network. It is strongly recommended to define a limited set of destinations wherever possible. * It is assumed that messages are transmitted sequentially to all receivers defined as a destination. (Be aware: this does not include intercepting devices) * Any max. hop count / TTL parameter of the physical network is ignored. * **Unidirectional**: Like Peer-To-Peer but no connection back to the source with the same route is expected. * **Multicast**: * The connection logic is similar to unidirectional connections. * Data is sent to all receivers simultaneously. * The DestinationEntityArray is ignored. * **Intercepting connections**: * These are special connections not related to specific destination entities but intercept all types of connections that are reachable by the corresponding device. In the case of broadcasts, this corresponds to a broadcast receiver, otherwise, this means the connection is routed through the corresponding device. * The DestinationEntityArray is ignored.

attribute.name: HostEntity
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to a simulation entity. If the referenced entity exists in the federation, the location of the node is derived from the location of the entity. If the referenced entity does not exist in the federation, the location of the node is defined by the Location attribute.

attribute.name: Location
attribute.semantics: Optional. Specifies the location of the `CommunicationNode` in case the entity referenced by `HostEntity` is not registered in the federation. If the referenced entity exists in the federation, the location of the communication node is derived from that entity and the value of the Location attribute shall be ignored.

attribute.name: RequestedConnections
attribute.semantics: Required. Possible (requested) connections for the communication node.

attribute.name: NetworkDevices
attribute.semantics: Required. Available network devices define the association of a communication network (connection layer) with a physical network (link layer). Each network device can be associated with several communication networks but only one physical network. Each network device also describes the transmitter and receiver capabilities.

objectClass.name: Connection
objectClass.semantics: A connection object describes the communication capability of each entity to all other entities for a communication network. The `Connection` object is created for each requested connection if there is at least one reachable receiver. The federation agreement defines which system is responsible for creating and maintaining the connection instance. The connection describes the connectivity but not the routes through a physical network defined by links between nodes.

attribute.name: CommunicationNetwork
attribute.semantics: Required. A reference to the communication network this connection belongs to.

attribute.name: SenderEntity
attribute.semantics: Required. A reference to the entity sending data using this connection.

attribute.name: Receivers
attribute.semantics: Required. Characteristics of the connections to individual receiving entities.

objectClass.name: PhysicalNetwork
objectClass.semantics: The `PhysicalNetwork` object class represents type-specific parameters/constraints for a physical network. Physical networks are simulated by `LinkState` objects and do not require that an instance of PhysicalNetwork exist in the federation.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: Required. Unique physical network name. Uniqueness in the context of physical networks.

attribute.name: Description
attribute.semantics: Required. Characteristics of the physical network.

objectClass.name: LinkStates
objectClass.semantics:
A `LinkStates` object describes the presence and quality of a set of direct links between nodes on a physical level. Links are defined between a transmitting and receiving device.
Bidirectional links assume identical link quality in both directions. Otherwise, two unidirectional links should be described.
Each `LinkStates` instance is associated with one physical network. To support load balancing in link quality simulation, multiple `LinkStates` instances can be associated with the same physical network as long as they do not contain duplicated link-state information.
A link should not be contained in more than one `LinkStates` object. If a link is not contained in any instance, it is not present, and it means it could not be established.
The `LinkStates` provides information that can be used to calculate connections.

attribute.name: PhysicalNetwork
attribute.semantics: Required. Reference to a physical network.

attribute.name: Links
attribute.semantics: Required. Status of a set of physical network links.

objectClass.name: DisruptionEffect
objectClass.semantics: The `DisruptionEffect` object class is used to represent the disruption of connections between communication nodes in an affected area. Communication models can subscribe to disruption-effect objects and use the information to simulate the effect of disruption on communication nodes, connections and link states.

attribute.name: Networks
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to all affected physical and communication networks. If not provided all networks in the specified area are affected.

attribute.name: Area
attribute.semantics: Optional. The area affected by the disruption. If not provided the default is a global disruption and all connections are affected.

attribute.name: Effect
attribute.semantics: Required. Level of disruption. 100% equals No connectivity and 0% no disruption effect. The level of disruption can vary over time.

objectClass.name: EnvironmentObject
objectClass.semantics: A base class of environment point, linear, or areal object classes.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: Optional. A name of the EnvironmentObject.

attribute.name: Symbol
attribute.semantics: Optional. A symbol identifier.

attribute.name: Status
attribute.semantics: Optional. Specifies if the EnvironmentObject is considered active in the simulation. An inactive object should not affect other simulation models. The default value is 1 (Active).

attribute.name: DamageState
attribute.semantics: Optional. The damage state of an EnvironmentObject. The default value is 0 (NoDamage).

attribute.name: Comment
attribute.semantics: Optional. A descriptive text comment.

attribute.name: HostObject
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to the host object. Required when using Breach/Burst objects.

attribute.name: ObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies this EnvironmentObject instance (point, linear or areal)

attribute.name: ReferencedObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the Synthetic Environment object instance to which this EnvironmentObject instance is associated

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the force that created or modified this EnvironmentObject instance

attribute.name: ObjectType
attribute.semantics: Identifies the type of this EnvironmentObject instance

objectClass.name: LinearObject
objectClass.semantics: A synthetic environment object that has size and an orientation and is geometrically anchored to the terrain with one point.

attribute.name: Points
attribute.semantics: Required. A path with at least 2 locations.

objectClass.name: BreachableLinearObject
objectClass.semantics: A linear object that can be breached.

attribute.name: SegmentRecords
attribute.semantics: Specifies a breachable linear object

objectClass.name: Levee
objectClass.semantics: A levee is a wall/separator that protects an area from flooding.

attribute.name: Height
attribute.semantics: Required: Max height over Mean-Sea Level that this levee protects against flooding.

objectClass.name: Firebreak
objectClass.semantics: A firebreak is a corridor without any burning things. The firebreak should separate the burning part from the not burning part.

attribute.name: Width
attribute.semantics: Required: Width of the firebreak.

objectClass.name: BreachObject
objectClass.semantics: A breach linear object.

attribute.name: SegmentRecords
attribute.semantics: Specifies a breach linear object

objectClass.name: ExhaustSmokeObject
objectClass.semantics: An exhaust smoke linear object.

attribute.name: SegmentRecords
attribute.semantics: Specifies an exhaust smoke linear object

objectClass.name: OtherLinearObject
objectClass.semantics: Linear objects other than BreachableLinear, Breach, ExhaustSmoke, or MinefieldLaneMarker objects.

objectClass.name: MinefieldLaneMarkerObject
objectClass.semantics: A minefield lane marker showing a cleared lane through a specific minefield, defined as a linear object.

attribute.name: SegmentRecords
attribute.semantics: Specifies a minefield lane marker showing a cleared lane through a minefield

objectClass.name: PointObject
objectClass.semantics: A synthetic environment object that is geometrically anchored to the terrain with a single point.

attribute.name: Radius
attribute.semantics: Optional. The radius of the point object.

attribute.name: Location
attribute.semantics: Specifies the location of the object based on x, y and z coordinates

attribute.name: Orientation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the angles of rotation around the coordinate axis between the object's attitude and the reference coordinate system axes ; these are calculated as the Tait-Bryan Euler angles, specifying the successive rotations needed to transform from the world coordinate system to the object coordinate system

attribute.name: PercentComplete
attribute.semantics: Specifies the percent completion of the object

attribute.name: DamagedAppearance
attribute.semantics: Specifies the damaged appearance of the object instance

attribute.name: ObjectPreDistributed
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was created before the start of the exercise

attribute.name: Deactivated
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object has been deactivated (it has ceased to exist in the synthetic environment)

attribute.name: Smoking
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is smoking (creating a smoke plume)

attribute.name: Flaming
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is aflame

objectClass.name: Checkpoint
objectClass.semantics: A CheckPoint defines a location where simulated entities' ground movement should stop and wait a specified time before continuing their route.

attribute.name: DelayTime
attribute.semantics: Required. The time that an entity shall wait at the checkpoint before passing. The time is a nominal value; models can use this for modifying delay time for different types of entities, e.g. add or subtract a value or multiply with a factor dependent on the simulation entity type.

objectClass.name: ObservationPost
objectClass.semantics: A ObservationPost defines a location where a simulated entity can observe an area.

attribute.name: Operator
attribute.semantics: Required. Reference to the unit operating this observation post.

attribute.name: ObservationArea
attribute.semantics: Optional. The area to be observed.

objectClass.name: BreachablePointObject
objectClass.semantics: A point object that can be breached.

attribute.name: BreachedStatus
attribute.semantics: Specifies the breached appearance of the object

objectClass.name: BurstPointObject
objectClass.semantics: A burst point object.

attribute.name: PercentOpacity
attribute.semantics: Specifies the opacity of the smoke

attribute.name: CylinderSize
attribute.semantics: Specifies the radius of the cylinder approximating an individual smoke burst ; for multiple bursts, the center bottom of each cylinder is calculated based on the model used to represent the multiple bursts

attribute.name: CylinderHeight
attribute.semantics: Specifies the height of the cylinder approximating an individual smoke burst ; for multiple bursts, the center bottom of each cylinder is calculated based on the model used to represent the multiple bursts

attribute.name: NumberOfBursts
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of bursts in the instance of tactical smoke

attribute.name: ChemicalContent
attribute.semantics: Specifies the chemical content of the smoke

objectClass.name: CraterObject
objectClass.semantics: A pit, depression, or cavity formed in the surface of the earth by an explosion. The depression's shape can range from saucer to conical, depending largely of the depth of burst.

attribute.name: CraterSize
attribute.semantics: Specifies the diameter of the crater, where the center of the crater is at the point object location

objectClass.name: OtherPointObject
objectClass.semantics: Point objects other than Breachable, Burst, Crater, RibbonBridge, or Structure objects.

objectClass.name: RibbonBridgeObject
objectClass.semantics: A ribbon bridge object.

attribute.name: NumberOfSegments
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of segments composing the ribbon bridge

objectClass.name: StructureObject
objectClass.semantics: A building structure, building rubble, stationary bridge, AVLB object.

objectClass.name: ArealObject
objectClass.semantics: A synthetic environment object that is geometrically anchored to the terrain with a set of three or more points, which comes to a closure.

attribute.name: PointsData
attribute.semantics: Specifies the physical location (a collection of points) of the object

attribute.name: PercentComplete
attribute.semantics: Specifies the percent completion of the object

attribute.name: DamagedAppearance
attribute.semantics: Specifies the damaged appearance of the object

attribute.name: ObjectPreDistributed
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was created before the start of the exercise

attribute.name: Deactivated
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object has been deactivated (it has ceased to exist in the synthetic environment)

attribute.name: Smoking
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is smoking (creating a smoke plume)

attribute.name: Flaming
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is aflame

objectClass.name: ArealBreach
objectClass.semantics: A cleared area within an obstacle allows simulated entities to move through the obstacle.

objectClass.name: MinefieldObject
objectClass.semantics: A mine, mine weapon, mine row, mine strip, mine lane, mine marker or minefield, defined as an areal environment object.

attribute.name: BreachedStatus
attribute.semantics: Specifies the breached appearance of the minefield object

attribute.name: MineCount
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of mines in the minefield

objectClass.name: OtherArealObject
objectClass.semantics: Areal objects other than Minefield objects.

objectClass.name: ETR_DelegatedTask
objectClass.semantics: Object to represent a task and its execution progress when delegated to a federate application other than the one responsible for the tasked entity.

attribute.name: TaskDefinition
attribute.semantics: Required. Definition description of the task represented.

attribute.name: TaskProgress
attribute.semantics: Required. Progress description of the task represented.

objectClass.name: METOC_EnvironmentCondition
objectClass.semantics:
Root class for all types of environment condition objects.
The `GeoReference` attribute defines the region where the EnvironmentCondition applies.
If `GeoReference` is a geographical area, and the subclass in question has a surface (water/land), the environmental condition applies only within that area of the surface.
If `GeoReference` is a geographical area, and the environmental condition defines a Layer attribute, it applies only within the volume bounded by the layer and the body described by projecting each point of the area along a line through the centre of the Earth.
If `GeoReference` is an `RPREntityReference`, a NETNEntityReference or a GMLFeatureReference, the environment condition applies only to the immediate vicinity of the referenced entity/feature and any layer attribute is ignored.
If not provided, the environment condition is considered global, only restricted by the semantics of its particular subclass.

attribute.name: GeoReference
attribute.semantics: Optional. A geographical location, region, feature or simulated object.

attribute.name: METOC_Service
attribute.semantics: Optional: Reference to the METOC service that generated this Environment Condition.

attribute.name: Priority
attribute.semantics: Optional: Indication of priority when calculating overlapping environment conditions of the same type. If Overlapping environment conditions of the same type, e.g., TroposphereLayer, exists, then the environment condition with the highest priority takes precedence. If multiple environment conditions with the same highest condition exists, use the NETN-METOC merging rules.

objectClass.name: Weather
objectClass.semantics: The `Weather` object class represents typical weather-related attributes such as temperature, wind and precipitation but also details regarding barometric pressure, humidity, visual range and haze conditions.

attribute.name: VisibilityRange
attribute.semantics: Optional. The distance at which the human eye in the region/location can discern an object or light. Use the minimum distance if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: Temperature
attribute.semantics: Optional. The temperature in the region/location at the specified reference altitude. Temperature for specific altitudes is calculated using the International Standard Atmosphere (ISA) model. Default = 0.

attribute.name: ReferenceAltitude
attribute.semantics: Optional: The altitude/depth at which pressure and temperature values are calculated.

attribute.name: BarometricPressure
attribute.semantics: Optional. The barometric pressure in millibar or hectopascal (1 mbar = 1hPa) in the region/location at the specified reference altitude. Barometric pressure for specific altitudes are calculated using the International Standard Atmosphere (ISA) model. Default is 1013.25 hPa (standard pressure at sea level).

attribute.name: Wind
attribute.semantics: Optional. Wind speed and direction in the region/location. Use the average wind speed if overlapping weather regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: Precipitation
attribute.semantics: Optional. Current precipitation type and intensity in the region/location. The default is No Precipitation. Use the average intensity of overlapping weather regions/locations. Resolve conflicting precipitation types according to the following precedence: Snow, Hail, Rain, and No Precipitation. E.g. If there is one overlapping environment condition with Snow, the result is always Snow.

attribute.name: Haze
attribute.semantics: Optional. Current Haze-type and density in the region/location specified by the Environment Condition. The default is No Haze. Use the average density for overlapping regions/locations with the same haze type.

attribute.name: Humidity
attribute.semantics: Optional. The humidity in the region/location. The default is 75% (Normal value). Use the average humidity if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: LightningType
attribute.semantics: Optional: Level of lightning present. Default 0 = No lightning.

attribute.name: LightningIntensity
attribute.semantics: Optional: The intesity of lightning. Default = 0.

objectClass.name: LandSurface
objectClass.semantics: The environmental conditions related to a land surface include inherited attributes such as temperature, wind and precipitation and add additional detail regarding the land surface's snow, moisture, and ice conditions.

attribute.name: Snow
attribute.semantics: Optional. Current snow depth and density in the region/location. The default is no snow. Use the average snow depth and density if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: Moisture
attribute.semantics: Optional. Surface moisture in the region/location. The default is 0 (Dry). Use the highest enumerated value (most moisture) if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: IceCondition
attribute.semantics: Optional. Surface ice condition in the region/location. The default is no ice. Use the highest enumerated value (most severe ice condition) if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: RainAccumulation
attribute.semantics: Optional: Accumulated amount of rain on land surface.

objectClass.name: WaterSurface
objectClass.semantics: The `WaterSurface` object specifies the sea surface condition in the specified region.

attribute.name: SeaState
attribute.semantics: Optional. State of the sea surface. The default is Calm_glassy. Use the last updated value if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: Salinity
attribute.semantics: Optional. The salinity of seawater on the practical salinity scale 1978 (PSS-78). The default value is 35 (equivalent to 35 parts per thousand). Use the average salinity if overlapping regions/locations.

attribute.name: SurfaceAltitude
attribute.semantics: Optional. The altitude of a water surface relative to MSL. The default is 0.

attribute.name: Surge
attribute.semantics: Optional. Change in the normal altitude of the surface due to tide, surge, drought, flooding etc. Default = 0.

attribute.name: Ice
attribute.semantics: Optional. Ice condition on the surface. The default is no ice. Use the latest updated value if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: Current
attribute.semantics: Optional. Current on the water surface. The default is no current. Ignored if the surface has 100% Ice coverage. Use the average current direction and speed if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: Wave
attribute.semantics: Optional. Waves on the water's surface. The default is no waves. Ignored if the surface has 100% Ice coverage. Use the latest updated value if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: Swell
attribute.semantics: Optional. Swell of the body of water. The default is no Swell. Ignored if the surface has 100% Ice coverage. Use the latest updated value if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: Choppiness
attribute.semantics: Optional: A degree of choppiness of the water surface ranging from 0% = no choppiness to 100% = max choppy. Default = 0.

objectClass.name: TroposphereLayer
objectClass.semantics: The `TroposphereLayer` associates weather and cloud coverage with a specific layer in the troposphere.

attribute.name: Layer
attribute.semantics: Optional. The volume of the atmosphere extends from a base altitude and upwards (see LayerStruct). Ignore any portion of the layer extending below sea level. The default is a mean sea level base and an infinite layer thickness.

attribute.name: Cloud
attribute.semantics: Optional. Data about Clouds in the Atmospheric layer. The default is no clouds. Use the latest updated value if overlapping layers exist.

objectClass.name: SubsurfaceLayer
objectClass.semantics: The environmental condition of a subsurface water layer.

attribute.name: Layer
attribute.semantics: Optional. A body of water extends upwards from a (negative) base altitude (see LayerStruct). Ignore any portion of the layer extending above sea level. The default value is the volume between the sea floor and the surface.

attribute.name: VisibilityRange
attribute.semantics: Optional. The distance at which the human eye in the region/location can discern an object or light. Use the minimum distance if overlapping regions/locations exist.

attribute.name: Temperature
attribute.semantics: Optional. The temperature at the base altitude of the subsurface layer. Default = 0.

attribute.name: Current
attribute.semantics: Optional. Describes current in the water layer. The default is no current. Use the average current direction and speed if overlapping layers exist.

attribute.name: Salinity
attribute.semantics: Optional. The salinity of seawater on the practical salinity scale 1978 (PSS-78). The default value is 35 (equivalent to 35 parts per thousand). Use the average salinity if overlapping layers exist.

attribute.name: BottomType
attribute.semantics: Optional. Type of sediment on the sea floor. The default is `NoSediment`. Use the latest if overlapping layers exist.

objectClass.name: WindCorridor
objectClass.semantics: Represents a specific wind related environment condition expressed as wind speed in a specified corridor.

attribute.name: Path
attribute.semantics: Required. The path of the corridor.

attribute.name: Width
attribute.semantics: Required: The width of the corridor centered on the geodetic path.

attribute.name: Height
attribute.semantics: Required. The height of the corridor centered on the geodetic path.

attribute.name: WindSpeed
attribute.semantics: Required. Wind speed in the direction of the wind corridor along a geodetic path.

objectClass.name: SMC_Service
objectClass.semantics: Represents a service the referenced federate provides with additional information regarding supported control actions.

attribute.name: Federate
attribute.semantics: Required: The federate providing the service.

attribute.name: SupportedActions
attribute.semantics: Required: Indicates which SMC control actions are supported by the referenced federate.

objectClass.name: METOC_Service
objectClass.semantics: The available METOC services are objects in the federation.

attribute.name: ModelType
attribute.semantics: Required. Type of METOC model provided by the service. Specifies whether the service delivers Simulated, Real (Historical), Live (Current) or Standard model data.

objectClass.name: EntitySimulation
objectClass.semantics: A service providing modelling responsibility for aggregate and/or physical entities.

attribute.name: AggregateEntityAllocation
attribute.semantics: Optional. The organization Unit elements for which the federate has the responsibility of modelling corresponding Aggregate Entities. The default is an empty list.

attribute.name: PhysicalEntityAllocation
attribute.semantics: Optional. The the organization Equipment or Installation elements for which the federate has the responsibility of simulating a Physical Entity. The default is an empty list.

objectClass.name: Minefield
objectClass.semantics: An area of ground or water containing mines laid with or without a pattern.

attribute.name: ActiveStatus
attribute.semantics: Specifies the active status of the minefield

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the force to which the minefield belongs

attribute.name: Lane
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the minefield has an active lane

attribute.name: MinefieldAppearanceType
attribute.semantics: Specifies the appearance information needed for displaying the symbology of the minefield

attribute.name: MinefieldIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Uniquely identifies this minefield instance in association with the federate's site and application

attribute.name: MinefieldLocation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the location of the center of the minefield

attribute.name: MinefieldOrientation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the orientation of the minefield, with Euler angles

attribute.name: MinefieldType
attribute.semantics: Specifies the minefield type

attribute.name: MineTypes
attribute.semantics: Specifies the type of each mine contained within the minefield

attribute.name: PerimeterPointCoordinates
attribute.semantics: Specifies the location of each perimeter point, relative to the minefield location

attribute.name: ProtocolMode
attribute.semantics: Specifies the mode (Heartbeat or Query Response Protocol) being used to communicate data about the minefield

attribute.name: State
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the minefield has been deactivated

objectClass.name: EmbeddedSystem
objectClass.semantics: A base class used to associate components such as sensor and emitting systems with their parent entity object.

attribute.name: EntityIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The EntityIdentifier of the object which this embedded system is a part of.

attribute.name: HostObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The RTI object instance ID of the object of which this embedded system is part of.

attribute.name: RelativePosition
attribute.semantics: The position of the embedded system, relative to the host object's position.

objectClass.name: MinefieldData
objectClass.semantics: The MinefieldData object class provides data about collections of mines within a minefield on an individual mine basis.

attribute.name: GroundBurialDepthOffset
attribute.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the ground surface

attribute.name: Fusing
attribute.semantics: Specifies the primary and secondary fuse and anti-handling device for each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: MineEmplacementTime
attribute.semantics: Specifies the real-world (UTC) emplacement time of each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: MineEntityIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the mine entity identifier; the MineEntityID in conjunction with the MinefieldID form the unique identifier for each mine

attribute.name: MinefieldIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the minefield to which the mines belong

attribute.name: MineLocation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the location of the mine relative to the minefield location for each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: MineOrientation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the orientation of the center axis direction of fire of the mine, relative to the minefield Coordinate System for each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: MineType
attribute.semantics: Specifies the type of mine for the collection of mines contained within the MinefieldData object

attribute.name: NumberTripDetonationWires
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of trip detonation wires that exist for each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: NumberWireVertices
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of vertices for each trip wire of each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: PaintScheme
attribute.semantics: Specifies the camouflage scheme/color of the mine

attribute.name: Reflectance
attribute.semantics: Specifies the local dielectric difference between the mine and the surrounding soil

attribute.name: ScalarDetectionCoefficient
attribute.semantics: Specifies the coefficient to be utilized to insure proper correlation between detectors located on different simulation platforms

attribute.name: SensorTypes
attribute.semantics: In QRP mode, specifies the requesting sensor types which were specified in the minefield query whereas in Heartbeat mode, specifies the sensor types that are being served by the minefield

attribute.name: SnowBurialDepthOffset
attribute.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the snow surface

attribute.name: ThermalContrast
attribute.semantics: Specifies the temperature difference between the mine and the surround soil in degrees Centigrade

attribute.name: WaterBurialDepthOffset
attribute.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the water surface

attribute.name: WireVertices
attribute.semantics: Specifies the locations of vertices in a trip wire

objectClass.name: RadioTransmitter
objectClass.semantics: A device that sends out information encoded in electromagnetic waves in the radio frequency range.

attribute.name: AntennaPatternData
attribute.semantics: The radiation pattern of the radio's antenna.

attribute.name: CryptographicMode
attribute.semantics: The mode of the cryptographic system.

attribute.name: CryptoSystem
attribute.semantics: The type of cryptographic equipment in use.

attribute.name: EncryptionKeyIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the key used to encrypt the radio signals being transmitted. The transmitter and receiver should be considered to be using the same key if these numbers match.

attribute.name: Frequency
attribute.semantics: The center frequency of the radio transmissions.

attribute.name: FrequencyBandwidth
attribute.semantics: The bandpass of the radio transmissions.

attribute.name: RadioIndex
attribute.semantics: A number that uniquely identifies this radio from others on the host.

attribute.name: RadioInputSource
attribute.semantics: Specifies which position or data port provided the input for the transmission.

attribute.name: RadioSystemType
attribute.semantics: The type of radio transmitter.

attribute.name: RFModulationSystemType
attribute.semantics: The radio system type associated with this transmitter.

attribute.name: RFModulationType
attribute.semantics: Classification of the modulation type.

attribute.name: SpreadSpectrum
attribute.semantics: Describes the spread spectrum characteristics of the transmission, such as frequency hopping or other spread spectrum transmission modes.

attribute.name: StreamTag
attribute.semantics: A globally unique identifier for the associated audio stream

attribute.name: TimeHopInUse
attribute.semantics: Whether the radio is using time hopping or not.

attribute.name: TransmittedPower
attribute.semantics: The average transmitted power.

attribute.name: TransmitterOperationalStatus
attribute.semantics: The current operational state of the radio transmitter.

attribute.name: WorldLocation
attribute.semantics: The location of the antenna in the world coordinate system.

objectClass.name: RadioReceiver
objectClass.semantics: A device that converts incoming electromagnetic waves in the radio frequency range into information.

attribute.name: RadioIndex
attribute.semantics: A number that uniquely identifies this radio receiver from other receivers on the host object.

attribute.name: ReceivedPower
attribute.semantics: The radio frequency power received, after applying any propagation loss and antenna gain.

attribute.name: ReceivedTransmitterIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The object instance ID of the transmitter that generated the received radio signal.

attribute.name: ReceiverOperationalStatus
attribute.semantics: The operational state of the radio receiver.

objectClass.name: Designator
objectClass.semantics: A system used to designate or mark a location or object, such as a laser designator which supports a laser-guided weapon engagement.

attribute.name: CodeName
attribute.semantics: The code name of the designator system.

attribute.name: DesignatedObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The object instance ID of the entity that is currently being designated (if any).

attribute.name: DesignatorCode
attribute.semantics: The designator code being used by the designating entity.

attribute.name: DesignatorEmissionWavelength
attribute.semantics: The wavelength of the designator system.

attribute.name: DesignatorOutputPower
attribute.semantics: The output power of the designator system.

attribute.name: DesignatorSpotLocation
attribute.semantics: The location, in the world coordinate system, of the designator spot.

attribute.name: DeadReckoningAlgorithm
attribute.semantics: Dead reckoning algorithm used by the issuing object.

attribute.name: RelativeSpotLocation
attribute.semantics: The location of the designator spot, relative to the object being designated (if any).

attribute.name: SpotLinearAccelerationVector
attribute.semantics: The rate of change in linear velocity of the designator spot over time.

objectClass.name: EmitterSystem
objectClass.semantics: A device that radiates an electromagnetic signal, such as a radar or jammer.

attribute.name: EmitterFunctionCode
attribute.semantics: The function of the emitter system.

attribute.name: EmitterType
attribute.semantics: The type of the emitter system.

attribute.name: EmitterIndex
attribute.semantics: A unique number, which uniquely identifies the emitter system from other on the same host entity.

attribute.name: EventIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The EventIdentifier is used by the generating federate to associate related events. The event number shall start at one at the beginning of the exercise, and be incremented by one for each event.

objectClass.name: IFF
objectClass.semantics: Interrogator Friend or Foe (IFF) system, Air Traffic Control Beacon and Transponder system, collision avoidance and navigational aids systems.

attribute.name: BeamAzimuthCenter
attribute.semantics: The azimuth center of the IFF beam's scan volume relative to the IFF system.

attribute.name: BeamAzimuthSweep
attribute.semantics: The azimuth half-angle of the IFF beam's scan volume relative to the IFF system.

attribute.name: BeamElevationCenter
attribute.semantics: The elevation center of the IFF beam's scan volume relative to the IFF system.

attribute.name: BeamElevationSweep
attribute.semantics: The elevation half-angle of the IFF beam's scan volume relative to the IFF system.

attribute.name: BeamSweepSync
attribute.semantics: The percentage of time a scan is through its pattern from its origin.

attribute.name: EventIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Used to associate related events.

attribute.name: FundamentalParameterData
attribute.semantics: The fundamental energy radiation characteristics of the IFF/ATC/NAVAIDS system.

attribute.name: Layer2DataAvailable
attribute.semantics: Specifies if level 2 data is available for this IFF system. If level 2 data is available then the BeamAzimuthCenter, BeamAzimuthSweep, BeamElevationCenter, BeamElevationSweep, BeamSweepSync, FundamentalParameterData, SecondaryOperationalDataParameter1, and SecondaryOperationalDataParameter2 attributes shall be generated.

attribute.name: SecondaryOperationalDataParameter1
attribute.semantics: Additional characteristics of the IFF/ATC/NAVAIDS emitting system.

attribute.name: SecondaryOperationalDataParameter2
attribute.semantics: Additional characteristics of the IFF/ATC/NAVAIDS emitting system.

attribute.name: SystemMode
attribute.semantics: Mode of operation.

attribute.name: SystemName
attribute.semantics: Particular named type of the IFF system in use.

attribute.name: SystemType
attribute.semantics: General type of IFF system in use.

attribute.name: SystemIsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether or not the system is on.

attribute.name: SystemIsOperational
