attribute.semantics: Whether or not the system is operational.

objectClass.name: NatoIFF
objectClass.semantics: NATO Identification Friend or Foe (IFF) system that uses electromagnetic transmissions to which friendly forces' equipment automatically responds.

attribute.name: AlternateMode4
attribute.semantics: IFF Alternate Mode 4.

attribute.name: Mode1Enabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 1 is enabled.

attribute.name: Mode1IsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 1 is damaged.

attribute.name: Mode1IsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 1 is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Mode1IsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 1 is on.

attribute.name: Mode2Enabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 2 is enabled.

attribute.name: Mode2IsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 2 is damaged.

attribute.name: Mode2IsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 2 is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Mode2IsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 2 is on.

attribute.name: Mode3AEnabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 3 is enabled.

attribute.name: Mode3AIsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 3 is damaged.

attribute.name: Mode3AIsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 3 is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Mode3AIsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 3 is on.

attribute.name: Mode4Enabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 4 is enabled.

attribute.name: Mode4IsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 4 is damaged.

attribute.name: Mode4IsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 4 is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Mode4IsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 4 is on.

attribute.name: Mode4PseudoCrypto
attribute.semantics: Mode 4 Pseudo-Crypto value (0-4094).

attribute.name: Mode4PseudoCryptoAvailable
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Mode 4 pseudo-crypto value is available.

attribute.name: Mode5CEnabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 5 - Mode C is enabled.

attribute.name: Mode5CIsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 5 - Mode C is damaged.

attribute.name: Mode5CIsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 5 - Mode C is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Mode5CIsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 5 - Mode C is on.

attribute.name: ModeSEnabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 6 - Mode S is enabled.

attribute.name: ModeSIsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 6 - Mode S is damaged.

attribute.name: ModeSIsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 6 - Mode S is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: ModeSIsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 6 - Mode S is on.

attribute.name: ModeSIsTcasI
attribute.semantics: Specifies which Traffic Alert/Collision Avoidance System is used. FALSE means TCAS I, TRUE means TCAS II.

objectClass.name: NatoIFFInterrogator
objectClass.semantics: The part of an IFF system that first transmits electromagnetic signals.

objectClass.name: NatoIFFTransponder
objectClass.semantics: The part of a specific IFF system that responds (for example by emitting pulses) to the electromagnetic signals.

attribute.name: EmergencyOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not emergency is on.

attribute.name: IdentSquawkFlashOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the squawk ident/flash is on.

attribute.name: Mode1Code
attribute.semantics: Mode 1 code, two octal values.

attribute.name: Mode2Code
attribute.semantics: Mode 2 code, four octal values.

attribute.name: Mode3ACode
attribute.semantics: Mode 3 code, four octal values.

attribute.name: Mode5CAltitude
attribute.semantics: Parameter 5 - Mode C altitude.

attribute.name: Mode5CAltitudeAvailable
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 5 - Mode C altitude is available.

attribute.name: StiOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not STI is on.

objectClass.name: SovietIFF
objectClass.semantics: Soviet type IFF system

attribute.name: Parameter1Enabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 1 is enabled.

attribute.name: Parameter1IsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 1 is damaged.

attribute.name: Parameter1IsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 1 is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Parameter1IsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 1 is on.

attribute.name: Parameter2Enabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 2 is enabled.

attribute.name: Parameter2IsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 2 is damaged.

attribute.name: Parameter2IsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 2 is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Parameter2IsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 2 is on.

attribute.name: Parameter3Enabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 3 is enabled.

attribute.name: Parameter3IsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 3 is damaged.

attribute.name: Parameter3IsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 3 is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Parameter3IsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 3 is on.

attribute.name: Parameter4Enabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 4 is enabled.

attribute.name: Parameter4IsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 4 is damaged.

attribute.name: Parameter4IsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 4 is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Parameter4IsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 4 is on.

attribute.name: Parameter5Enabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 5 is enabled.

attribute.name: Parameter5IsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 5 is damaged.

attribute.name: Parameter5IsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 5 is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Parameter5IsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 5 is on.

attribute.name: Parameter6Enabled
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 6 is enabled.

attribute.name: Parameter6IsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 6 is damaged.

attribute.name: Parameter6IsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 6 is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: Parameter6IsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not Parameter 6 is on.

objectClass.name: SovietIFFInterrogator
objectClass.semantics: Soviet IFF Interrogator

objectClass.name: SovietIFFTransponder
objectClass.semantics: Soviet IFF Transponder

objectClass.name: RRB
objectClass.semantics: RRB IFF transponder system

attribute.name: Code
attribute.semantics: RRB Code (range 0-16)

attribute.name: PowerReduction
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not power reduction is on.

attribute.name: IsDamaged
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the system is damaged.

attribute.name: IsMalfunctioning
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the system is malfunctioning.

attribute.name: IsOn
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the system is on.

attribute.name: RadarEnhancement
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the radar enhancement is on.

objectClass.name: UnderwaterAcousticsEmission
objectClass.semantics: The underwater acoustic classes used to communicate underwater acoustic active, intentional emissions and Passive Signature or Unintentional Emissions information. These emissions are used during undersea warfare scenarios to detect, classify, and track hostile forces when electronic warfare mechanisms are unavailable.

attribute.name: EventIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The generating federate uses the Event Identifier to associate related events. The event number begins at one at the beginning of the exercise and is incremented by one for each event.

objectClass.name: ActiveSonar
objectClass.semantics: Describes the state of an active sonar system.

attribute.name: AcousticName
attribute.semantics: Defines the type of sonar being represented.

attribute.name: FunctionCode
attribute.semantics: Declares the current primary use of the sonar. It may be used by simulatons to infer intent.

attribute.name: AcousticsIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Unique identifier for the sonar on an entity, Starts with 1

objectClass.name: PropulsionNoise
objectClass.semantics: Describes the steady state component of unintended passive emissions that are normally associated with the power plant

attribute.name: HullMaskerOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the hull masker silencing system is on.

attribute.name: PassiveParameterIndex
attribute.semantics: Database index to look up the entities acoustic signature

attribute.name: PropulsionPlantConfiguration
attribute.semantics: The operating mode of the propulsion plant

attribute.name: ShaftRateData
attribute.semantics: Information about each of the propulsion shafts associated with the entity. Shafts are ordered from port to starboard, when looking from the stern to the bow.

objectClass.name: AdditionalPassiveActivities
objectClass.semantics: Describes the steady state components of non-propulsion passive emissions such as those held in the Additional Narrowband Database (ANDB).

attribute.name: ActivityCode
attribute.semantics: Database index used to indicate the passive signature of the entity

attribute.name: ActivityParameter
attribute.semantics: The current state of this activity.

attribute.name: IsSilent
attribute.semantics: Used to silence an additional passive activity without destroying this object.

objectClass.name: EnvironmentProcess
objectClass.semantics: An object class used to communicate information about environmental processes and effects.

attribute.name: ProcessIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies which process issued the environmental process update

attribute.name: Type
attribute.semantics: Identifies the environmental process type

attribute.name: ModelType
attribute.semantics: Identifies the model used for generating this environmental process update ; defined in 1278.1a as being exercise specific

attribute.name: EnvironmentProcessActive
attribute.semantics: Specifies the status of the environmental process (active or inactive)

attribute.name: SequenceNumber
attribute.semantics: Optional, used to support update sequencing ; if not used, set to EP_NO_SEQUENCE ; when used, set to zero for each exercise and incremented by one for each update sent

attribute.name: EnvironmentRecData
attribute.semantics: Specifies environment records

objectClass.name: GriddedData
objectClass.semantics: An object class used to depict global, spatially varying environmental effects.

attribute.name: GridIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the environmental simulation application

attribute.name: CoordinateSystem
attribute.semantics: Specifies the coordinate system used to locate the data grid

attribute.name: NumberOfGridAxes
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of grid axes used to define the data grid (e.g. three grid axes for an x, y, z coordinate system)

attribute.name: ConstantGrid
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether the grid axes remain constant for the life of the data grid

attribute.name: EnvironmentType
attribute.semantics: Identifies the type of environmental entity being described

attribute.name: Orientation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the orientation of the data grid, with Euler angles

attribute.name: SampleTime
attribute.semantics: Specifies the valid time of the environmental data sample

attribute.name: TotalValues
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of data values that make up this grid

attribute.name: VectorDimension
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of data values at each grid point ; VectorDimension shall be one for scalar data, and shall be greater than one when multiple enumerated environmental data values are sent for each grid point (e.g. u, v, w wind components have VectorDimension = 3)

attribute.name: GridAxisInfo
attribute.semantics: Specifies information on grid axes

attribute.name: GridDataInfo
attribute.semantics: Specifies information on grid data representations

objectClass.name: EmitterBeam
objectClass.semantics: A sector of concentrated energy from a device that radiates an electromagnetic signal. See also IEEE 1278.1-1995 Section 5.4.7.1.

attribute.name: BeamAzimuthCenter
attribute.semantics: The azimuth center of the emitter beam's scan volume relative to the emitter system.

attribute.name: BeamAzimuthSweep
attribute.semantics: The azimuth half-angle of the emitter beam's scan volume relative to the emitter system.

attribute.name: BeamElevationCenter
attribute.semantics: The elevation center of the emitter beam's scan volume relative to the emitter system.

attribute.name: BeamElevationSweep
attribute.semantics: The elevation half-angle of the emitter beam's scan volume relative to the emitter system.

attribute.name: BeamFunctionCode
attribute.semantics: The function of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: BeamIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the emitter beam (must be unique on the emitter system).

attribute.name: BeamParameterIndex
attribute.semantics: The index, into the federation specific emissions database, of the current operating mode of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: EffectiveRadiatedPower
attribute.semantics: The effective radiated power of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: EmissionFrequency
attribute.semantics: The center frequency of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: EmitterSystemIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the emitter system that is generating this emitter beam.

attribute.name: EventIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The EventIdentifier is used by the generating federate to associate related events. The event number shall start at one at the beginning of the exercise, and be incremented by one for each event.

attribute.name: FrequencyRange
attribute.semantics: The bandwidth of the frequencies covered by the emitter beam.

attribute.name: PulseRepetitionFrequency
attribute.semantics: The Pulse Repetition Frequency of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: PulseWidth
attribute.semantics: The pulse width of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: SweepSynch
attribute.semantics: The percentage of time a scan is through its pattern from its origin.

objectClass.name: RadarBeam
objectClass.semantics: A sector of concentrated energy from a device that radiates an electromagnetic signal.

attribute.name: HighDensityTrack
attribute.semantics: When TRUE the receiving simulation can assume that all targets that are in the scan pattern of the radar beam are being tracked

attribute.name: TrackObjectIdentifiers
attribute.semantics: Identification of the entities being tracked.

objectClass.name: JammerBeam
objectClass.semantics: An emitter beam that is designed to jam or otherwise interfere or confuse another emitter system

attribute.name: JammingModeSequence
attribute.semantics: The jamming mode technique or series of techniques being applied.

attribute.name: JammedObjectIdentifiers
attribute.semantics: Identification of the emitter beams being jammed.

attribute.name: HighDensityJam
attribute.semantics: When TRUE the receiving simulation can assume that all emitter beams that are in the scan pattern of the jammer beam are being jammed

objectClass.name: ActiveSonarBeam
objectClass.semantics: A sector of concentrated acoustic energy from an active sonar device.

attribute.name: ActiveEmissionParameterIndex
attribute.semantics: An index into the database of active (intentional) underwater acoustics emissions.

attribute.name: ActiveSonarIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The RTI ID of the ActiveSonar emitting this beam

attribute.name: AzimuthBeamwidth
attribute.semantics: The horizontal width of the main beam (as opposed to any side lobes) measured from beam center to the 3 dB down point. Omni directional beams shall have a beam width of 0 radians.

attribute.name: AzimuthCenter
attribute.semantics: The center azimuthal bearing of the main beam (as opposed to side lobes) in relation to the own ship heading, clockwise positive. Omnidirection beams shall have an azimuthal center of 0 radians.

attribute.name: BeamIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the active sonar beam, which must be unique on the active sonar system.

attribute.name: ElevationBeamwidth
attribute.semantics: Vertical angle from beam center to 3db down point. O is omnidirectional

attribute.name: ElevationCenter
attribute.semantics: The angle of axis of the beam center to the horizontal plane. Positive upward.

attribute.name: EventIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Used to associate changes to the beam with its ActiveSonar.

attribute.name: ScanPattern
attribute.semantics: The pattern that describes the angular movement of the sonar beam during its sweep.

parameter.name: UniqueId
parameter.semantics: Optional: A unique identifier for the interaction.

parameter.name: SendTime
parameter.semantics: Optional: Scenario time when the interaction was sent. Default is interpreted as the receivers scenario time when the interaction is received.

interactionClass.name: RadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: The wireless transmission and reception of audio or digital data by means of electromagnetic waves.

interactionClass.name: AIS_RadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: This is the root interaction class for all AIS messages. The interaction class contains a reference to the embedded system that represents the AIS transmitter. The embedded system should be modelled as a RadioTransmitter, an RPR-FOM object class that is subclassed from Embedded System.

parameter.name: HostRadioIndex
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). The HostRadioIndex is a unique string that identifies the name of the RadioTransmitter object.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage
interactionClass.semantics: Super class for all AIS message types.

parameter.name: MessageId
parameter.semantics: Required. Message type identifier.

parameter.name: UserId
parameter.semantics: Required. The message is from the vessel identified by this MMSI.

interactionClass.name: AisNavigationData
interactionClass.semantics: Message Types 1, 2 and 3 share a common reporting structure for navigational data, captured in this class.

parameter.name: NavigationalStatus
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not defined). Navigational status.

parameter.name: RateOfTurn
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Rate of turn.

parameter.name: SpeedOverGround
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Speed over the ground.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). AIS (Lat,Lon) position.

parameter.name: CourseOverGround
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Course over the ground.

parameter.name: TrueHeading
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). True heading.

parameter.name: UTCtime
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Time of the report.

parameter.name: SpecialManeuverIndicator
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Maneuver indication.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage1
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 1: Position Report Class A.
Message type for a scheduled position report; Class A shipborne mobile equipment. This message transmits information pertaining to a ships navigation: Longitude and latitude, time, heading, speed, ships navigation status (under power, at anchor...). This message is transmitted every 2 to 10 seconds while underway, and every 3 minutes while at anchor.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage2
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 2: Position Report Class A.
Message type for an assigned scheduled position report; Class A shipborne mobile equipment. This message transmits information pertaining to a ships navigation: Longitude and latitude, time, heading, speed, ships navigation status (under power, at anchor...). This message is transmitted every 2 to 10 seconds while underway, and every 3 minutes while at anchor.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage3
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 3: Position Report Class A.
Message type for a special position report, response to interrogation; Class A shipborne mobile equipment. This message transmits information pertaining to a ships navigation: Longitude and latitude, time, heading, speed, ships navigation status (under power, at anchor...). This message is transmitted every 2 to 10 seconds while underway, and every 3 minutes while at anchor.

interactionClass.name: AisBaseStationReportAndUTCDateResponseData
interactionClass.semantics: Common reporting structure for Message Types 4 and 11 for reporting UTC time and date and, at the same time, position. It is also used by AIS stations for determining if the station is within 120 NM for response to Messages Types 20 and 23.

parameter.name: UTCtime
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Time of report.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). AIS (Lat,Lon) position.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage4
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 4: Base Station Report.
This message is to be used by fixed-location base stations to periodically report a position and time reference.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage11
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 11: UTC/Date Response.
Identical to Message Type 4, with the semantics of a response to inquiry. This message type is only transmitted from a mobile station as a result of a UTC request message (Message Type 10).

interactionClass.name: AisStaticAndVoyageData
interactionClass.semantics: Common Static and Voyage Data for Message Types 5, 19 and 24.

parameter.name: Callsign
parameter.semantics: Required. 7 six-bit characters for the callsign.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.semantics: Required. 20 six-bit characters for the name.

parameter.name: ShipType
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Ship type.

parameter.name: DimensionBow
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). GPS Ant. distance from the bow.

parameter.name: DimensionStern
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). GPS Ant. distance from the stern.

parameter.name: DimensionPort
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). GPS Ant. distance from the port.

parameter.name: DimensionStarboard
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). GPS Ant. distance from starboard.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage5
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 5: Static and Voyage-Related Data.
This message type is transmitted every 6 minutes and should only be used by Class A shipborne and SAR aircraft AIS stations when reporting static or voyage-related data.

parameter.name: IMO
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: zero). The IMO ship ID number. Not applicable to SAR aircraft.

parameter.name: ETAtime
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Estimated time of arrival. Not applicable to SAR aircraft. If a zero value is provided then this shall be interpreted as not available.

parameter.name: Draught
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Maximum present static draught.

parameter.name: Destination
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available, 20 six-bit "@" value). 20 six-bit characters for the destination. For SAR aircraft, the use of this field may be decided by the responsible administration.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage19
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 19: Extended Class B CS Position Report.
A slightly more detailed report than Message Type 18 for vessels using Class B transmitters. Omits navigational status and rate of turn. Fields are as in the common navigation block and the Message Type 5 message.

parameter.name: SpeedOverGround
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Speed over the ground.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). AIS (Lat,Lon) position.

parameter.name: CourseOverGround
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Course over the ground.

parameter.name: TrueHeading
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). True heading.

parameter.name: UTCtime
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Time of the report.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage24
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 24: Static Data Report.
The equivalent of Message Type 5 for ships using Class B equipment. Also used to associate an MMSI with a name on either class A or class B equipment. This message type may be in part A or part B format. According to the standard, parts A and B are expected to be broadcast in adjacent pairs.

parameter.name: PartNumber
parameter.semantics: Required. Part number.

parameter.name: ManufacturerId
parameter.semantics: Required. (Part B) 3 six-bit chars.

parameter.name: UnitModel
parameter.semantics: Required. (Part B) Unit Model Code.

parameter.name: SerialNumber
parameter.semantics: Required. (Part B) Serial Number.

interactionClass.name: AisBinaryMessageData
interactionClass.semantics: Binary Payload for Message Types 6 and 8. The interpretation of the binary payload is controlled by: - The Designated Area Code (DAC), is a jurisdiction code: 366 for the United States. It uses the same encoding as the area designator in MMMSIs; see [ITU-MID]. 1 designates international (ITU) messages. - The FID is the Functional ID for a message subtype. In some sources, this is abbreviated FI.

parameter.name: DesignatedAreaCode
parameter.semantics: Required. Designated area code (DAC).

parameter.name: FunctionId
parameter.semantics: Required. Functional ID (FID).

parameter.name: Data
parameter.semantics: Required. Binary data up to 920 bits.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage6
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 6: Binary Addressed Message.
This message type is an addressed point-to-point message with a binary payload.

parameter.name: Destination
parameter.semantics: Required. Destination MMSI.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage8
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 8: Binary Broadcast Message.
This message type is a broadcast message with a binary payload.

interactionClass.name: AcknowledgeData
interactionClass.semantics: Acknowledge data for Message Types 7 and 13.

parameter.name: Destination1
parameter.semantics: Required. MMSI number 1.

parameter.name: Destination2
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). MMSI number 2.

parameter.name: Destination3
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). MMSI number 3.

parameter.name: Destination4
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). MMSI number 4.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage7
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 7: Binary Acknowledge.
This message type is a receipt acknowledgement to the senders of a previous messages of Message Type 6. Up to 4 destination MMSIs can be acknowledged in one message.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage13
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 13: Safety-Related Acknowledgement.
This message type is a receipt acknowledgement to senders of previous messages of Message Type 12.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage9
interactionClass.semantics:
Message type 9: Standard SAR Aircraft Position Report.
Tracking information for search-and-rescue aircraft.

parameter.name: Altitude
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Altitude.

parameter.name: SpeedOverGround
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Speed over the ground.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). AIS (Lat,Lon) position.

parameter.name: CourseOverGround
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Course over the ground.

parameter.name: UTCtime
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Time of the report.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage10
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 10: UTC/Date Inquiry.
Request for UTC/Date information from an AIS base station.

parameter.name: Destination
parameter.semantics: Required. Destination MMSI.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage12
interactionClass.semantics:
Type 12: Addressed Safety-Related Message.
This is a point-to-point text message. The payload is interpreted as six-bit text.

parameter.name: Destination
parameter.semantics: Required. Destination MMSI.

parameter.name: Message
parameter.semantics: Required. 1-156 chars of six-bit text.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage14
interactionClass.semantics:
Type 14: Safety-Related Broadcast Message.
This is a broadcast text message. The payload is interpreted as six-bit text.

parameter.name: Message
parameter.semantics: Required. 1-161 chars of six-bit text.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage17
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 17: DGNSS Broadcast Binary Message.
This message type is used to broadcast differential corrections for GPS.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Position data.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage18
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 18: Standard Class B CS Position Report.
A less detailed report than message types 1-3 for vessels using Class B transmitters. Omits navigational status and rate of turn.

parameter.name: SpeedOverGround
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Speed over the ground.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). AIS (Lat,Lon) position.

parameter.name: CourseOverGround
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Course over the ground.

parameter.name: TrueHeading
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). True heading.

parameter.name: UTCtime
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Time of the report.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage21
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 21: Aid-to-Navigation Report.
Identification and location message to be emitted by aids to navigation such as buoys and lighthouses.

parameter.name: AidType
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not specified). Type of aid.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: 34 six-bit @ characters). Up to max 34 six-bit characters for the name of the aid.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). AIS (Lat,Lon) position.

parameter.name: DimensionBow
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Distance from the bow.

parameter.name: DimensionStern
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Distance from the stern.

parameter.name: DimensionPort
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Distance from the port.

parameter.name: DimensionStarboard
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Distance from starboard.

parameter.name: UTCtime
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Time of the report.

parameter.name: OffPositionFlag
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: false). Off-Position Indicator. The Off-Position Indicator is for floating Aids-to-Navigation only: false means on position; true means off position. Only valid if UTCsecond is available.

parameter.name: VirtualFlag
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: false). Virtual-aid flag. The Virtual Aid flag is interpreted as follows: false = real Aid to Navigation at the indicated position; true = virtual Aid to Navigation simulated by nearby AIS station.

interactionClass.name: AisMessage27
interactionClass.semantics:
Message Type 27: Long Range AIS Broadcast message.
This message type is primarily intended for long-range detection of vessels equipped with AIS Class A (typically by satellite). This message has similar content to Messages 1, 2 and 3, but the total number of bits has been compressed to allow for increased propagation delays associated with long-range detection.

parameter.name: NavigationStatus
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not defined). Navigational status.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). AIS (Lat,Lon) position.

parameter.name: SpeedOverGround
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Speed over the ground.

parameter.name: CourseOverGround
parameter.semantics: Optional (Default: not available). Course over the ground.

interactionClass.name: EncodedAudioRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: A radio signal used to transmit voice/audio data encoded according to a standard encoding scheme.

parameter.name: AudioData
parameter.semantics: The data associated with the encoded audio radio signal

interactionClass.name: RawBinaryRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: A radio signal used to transmit raw binary data.

parameter.name: HostRadioIndex
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the radio transmitting this signal.

parameter.name: DataRate
parameter.semantics: The rate at which the data is being transmitted.

parameter.name: SignalDataLength
parameter.semantics: The length of the signal data.

parameter.name: SignalData
parameter.semantics: The signal data.

parameter.name: TacticalDataLinkType
parameter.semantics: The type of tactical data link used to transmitted this signal (if any).

parameter.name: TDLMessageCount
parameter.semantics: The number of tactical data link messages contained in this signal.

interactionClass.name: DatabaseIndexRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: A radio signal that represents transmission of a pre-determined message by using a pre-defined database index.

parameter.name: HostRadioIndex
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the radio transmitting this signal.

parameter.name: DatabaseIndex
parameter.semantics: The index into the federation specific database of stored signals.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: The duration of the stored signal to be replayed.

parameter.name: StartOffset
parameter.semantics: The offset, from the start of the stored signal, that the signal is replayed from.

parameter.name: TacticalDataLinkType
parameter.semantics: The type of tactical data link used to transmitted this signal (if any).

parameter.name: TDLMessageCount
parameter.semantics: The number of tactical data link messages contained in this signal.

interactionClass.name: ApplicationSpecificRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: A radio signal that can be used for an application specific encoding scheme.

parameter.name: HostRadioIndex
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the radio transmitting this signal.

parameter.name: DataRate
parameter.semantics: The rate at which the data is being transmitted.

parameter.name: SignalDataLength
parameter.semantics: The length of the signal data.

parameter.name: SignalData
parameter.semantics: The signal data.

parameter.name: TacticalDataLinkType
parameter.semantics: The type of tactical data link used to transmitted this signal (if any).

parameter.name: TDLMessageCount
parameter.semantics: The number of tactical data link messages contained in this signal.

parameter.name: UserProtocolID
parameter.semantics: The ID of the user protocol in use.

interactionClass.name: SMC_EntityControl
interactionClass.semantics: Control action intended for a federate with primary modelling responsibility for the referenced entity. The inherited NETN-BASE `UniqueId` parameter matches this interaction with a corresponding `SMC_Response`. Before sending this interaction, use the NETN-SMC `BaseEntity` object attribute `SupportedActions` to determine if the referenced entity supports the action.

parameter.name: Entity
parameter.semantics: Required: Reference to a simulation entity for which the control action is intended.

interactionClass.name: Task
interactionClass.semantics: Requests a simulated entity to perform some task based on a task description. If accepted, the federate application modelling the behaviour will execute the task per task parameters and scheduling. A request task is acknowledged using a `TaskStatusUpdate` response interaction. Resending a `RequestTask` with the same `TaskId` as a previously sent interaction is equivalent to cancelling and sending a new task.

parameter.name: CommunicationNetworks
parameter.semantics: Optional. Reference to communication networks (NETN-COM) used to transfer tasking messages. If not provided, the task transmission should not be modelled and federates should receive and act on the task messages directly.

parameter.name: TaskId
parameter.semantics: Required. Unique identifier for the task.

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.semantics: Optional. The default value is the current `SendTime`.

parameter.name: Activity
parameter.semantics: Optional. Specifies the activity for the entity that will execute the task. The default value is zero (0).

parameter.name: Annotation
parameter.semantics: Optional. A general text describing information about this task. The annotation may, e.g. include the reason for the task and text describing the names of referenced entities.

parameter.name: MainTask
parameter.semantics: Optional. Provided to indicate that this task is a subtask related to a main task.

parameter.name: PreviousTask
parameter.semantics: Optional. Provided to indicate that the task will execute after the referenced task.

parameter.name: NextTask
parameter.semantics: Optional. Provided to indicate that the task will execute before the referenced task.

parameter.name: Tasker
parameter.semantics: Optional. Reference to the commander of the task. If missing, the commander is undefined.

parameter.name: TaskMode
parameter.semantics: Optional. Determines the task mode. Default NonConcurrentMode

interactionClass.name: SendSafetyRelatedMessage
interactionClass.semantics:
Tasks entity (the source) to send a safety-related message (AIS message type 12) to another entity (the destination).
Both source and destination must represent an AIS station (vessel, SAR aircraft, etc).

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: SendSafetyRelatedBroadcastMessage
interactionClass.semantics:
Tasks entity (the source) to send a safety-related broadcast message (AIS message type 14).
The source must represent an AIS station (vessel, SAR aircraft, etc).

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task Parameters

interactionClass.name: ApplyIPE
interactionClass.semantics: Represents an task for the specified entities to use individual protective equipment.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: AdministerTreatment
interactionClass.semantics: Represents an order for the specified entities to receive the list of treatments.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: DisruptCommunication
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking of an entity to introduce a communication network disruption.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: SetTransmitterStatus
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking of an entity to switch on/off all of its transmitters.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: Evacuate
interactionClass.semantics: A request for evacuation

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: PumpFlooding
interactionClass.semantics: Task an entity to start pumping water out of an area.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: ExtinguishWildfire
interactionClass.semantics: Task an entity to extinguish a wildfire.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: CreateFireBreak
interactionClass.semantics: Use the `CreateFireBreak` task to request an entity to build a firebreak.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: CreateLevee
interactionClass.semantics: Use the `CreateLevee` task to request an entity to construct a levee.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: OtherActivity
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking of an entity to wait for a duration of time.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: DirectFire
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking an entity to fire directed at a specified target entity.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: IndirectFire
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking an entity to fire directed at an area.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: OperateCheckpoint
interactionClass.semantics: Request an entity to operate a checkpoint. The tasked entity should be within the radius of the checkpoint object. If not, a separate move task should be issued first. The tasked entity activates an inactive checkpoint and operates the checkpoint for the specified duration.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: Observe
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking of an entity to observe an area.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: MoveToLocation
interactionClass.semantics: Request a simulated entity to move to a specified destination location. The entity aligns with the path from its current position to the nearest position or waypoint on the path. The entity leaves the path at a position or waypoint on the path closest to the destination. If attached, the entity is detached immediately just before the move task starts.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: MoveIntoFormation
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking a simulated entity to move into the given formation on the given location with the given heading. If attached, the entity is detached immediately just before the move task starts.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: MoveInDirection
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking of an entity to move in a specified direction for a duration. If attached, the entity is detached immediately just before the move task starts.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: FollowEntity
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking of an entity to follow another entity at a specified distance. If attached, the entity is detached immediately just before the move task starts.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: Attach
interactionClass.semantics: Requesting a simulated entity to attach to (mount) the specified entity.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: Detach
interactionClass.semantics: Requesting a simulated entity to detach from a simulated entity.

interactionClass.name: MoveByRoute
interactionClass.semantics: Requesting a simulated entity to move given the specified route with a given speed for reaching each waypoint. The entity should align with the path from its current position to the first waypoint on the path using the speed set for the first waypoint in the route. When reaching the last waypoint, the speed is zero (0), and movement stops. If attached, the entity is detached immediately just before the move task starts.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: ChangeSpeed
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking of an entity to change speed.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: ChangeAltitude
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking of an entity to set move to a specified altitude.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: ChangeHeading
interactionClass.semantics: Tasking of an entity to change heading.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: Patrol
interactionClass.semantics: Requesting a simulated entity to perform a patrol task. The tasked entity moves from its current position to the start of the patrol route and then moves according to the patrol route from its start point in the path through all waypoints. If attached, the entity is detached immediately just before the move task starts.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: StopAtSideOfRoad
interactionClass.semantics: Requesting a simulated entity to stop at the side of the road. This task is only relevant for an entity moving along a road. The current move task is cancelled, and a new move task executes to a position at the side of the road (the simulator has to calculate this location). If attached, the entity is detached immediately just before the move task starts.

interactionClass.name: OperateObservationPost
interactionClass.semantics: Requests an entity to operate an observation post. The tasked unit should be within in a given radius from the observation post. If not, a separate move task should be issued first. The tasked unit activates an inactive observation post and operates it for the specified duration.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: EnterFacility
interactionClass.semantics: Requesting a simulated entity to enter the specified facility (cultural feature). The tasked entity should be within a certain distance (tolerance specified in the federation agreements) of the facility location to enter.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: MagicMove
interactionClass.semantics: Instructs the simulation entity to immediately change location to the specified position and heading. If attached, the entity is detached immediately just before the move task starts.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: ChangeRulesOfEngagement
interactionClass.semantics: Instructs the simulation entity to change its rules of engagement immediately.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: Transport
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a simulated entity (transporter entity) to transport another simulated entity (transported entity). Successful completion of the task means that (1) the transport and transported entity moves towards a specified pick-up point, (2) the transported entity mounts the transport, (3) the transport moves according to route and at the final waypoint (4) the transported entity dismounts the transport.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: Repair
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a simulated entity to perform repair activity on another simulated entity (receiving). Successful completion of the task means that the damage state of the receiving entity is improved.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: Resupply
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a simulated entity to resupply another simulated entity (receiving). Successful task completion means that supplies are reduced from the tasked entity and increased at the receiving entity.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters

interactionClass.name: CreateBreach
interactionClass.semantics: Requests a simulated entity to create a breach or passage on a breachable engineering object.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: EstablishCheckpoint
interactionClass.semantics: Requests a simulated entity to establish a checkpoint.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: LayMinefield
interactionClass.semantics: Requests a simulated entity to lay a minefield within a specified area and amount of mines.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: CreateObstacle
interactionClass.semantics: Requests a simulated entity to create an obstacle within the given area. The tasked entity should be within a certain distance (tolerance specified in the federation agreement) of one of the points of the geometry.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: ClearEngineering
interactionClass.semantics: Requests a simulated entity to clear/remove an engineering object. The clearing activity's duration may depend on the entity's model.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required: Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: EstablishObservationPost
interactionClass.semantics: Requests a simulated entity to establish a observation post.

parameter.name: TaskParameters
parameter.semantics: Required. Task parameters.

interactionClass.name: SetPlatformContamination
interactionClass.semantics: Represents an update to the contaminating mass inside a vehicle due to embedded entities.

parameter.name: Contamination
parameter.semantics: New state of CBRN hazardous agent inside vehicle due to embedded units.

interactionClass.name: SetCasualtyEffect
interactionClass.semantics: Informs the federate representing the entity of the casualty effects of exposure.

parameter.name: TriageLevel
parameter.semantics: Required: Triage level of this entity.

parameter.name: Exposures
parameter.semantics: Optional: Array of agents to which this unit has been exposed.

interactionClass.name: RequestTaskStatus
interactionClass.semantics: Requests the federate application modelling the tasked entity to send a `TaskStatusUpdate` interaction for the specified tasks.

parameter.name: Tasks
parameter.semantics: Optional. Tasks for which status reports are requested. The default, if not provided or if the list of tasks is empty, the request refers to all tasks for the tasked entity.

interactionClass.name: CancelTasks
interactionClass.semantics: Request to cancel all one or more tasks.

parameter.name: Tasks
parameter.semantics: Required. Tasks to cancel. If no specific tasks are indicated, the default is to cancel all scheduled and ongoing tasks for the simulation entity.

interactionClass.name: SetPersonnelStatus
interactionClass.semantics: Instruct federate with the primary responsibility of the specified simulated entity to update the model concerning its Personnel. Only applicable to AggregateEntity.

parameter.name: PersonnelStatus
parameter.semantics: Required: Status of a specific type of personnel.

interactionClass.name: SetSuppliesStatus
interactionClass.semantics: Instruct federate with the primary responsibility of the specified simulated entity to update the model concerning its Supplies. Only applicable to AggregateEntity.

parameter.name: SupplyStatus
parameter.semantics: Required: New quantity of a specific supply.

interactionClass.name: SetEquipmentStatus
interactionClass.semantics: Instruct federate with the primary responsibility of the specified simulated entity to update the model concerning its Equipment. Only applicable to AggregateEntity.

parameter.name: EquipmentStatus
parameter.semantics: Required: Status of a specific type of equipment.

interactionClass.name: Reset
interactionClass.semantics: Request a reset of aspects of an entity's state to its last initialized value.

parameter.name: ResetEquipment
parameter.semantics: Optional: Indicate if equipment state of the entity should be reset to last initialized value. Default is False.

parameter.name: ResetPersonnel
parameter.semantics: Optional: Indicate if personnel state of the entity should be reset to last initialized value. Default is False.

parameter.name: ResetSupplies
parameter.semantics: Optional: Indicate if supplies state of the entity should be reset to last initialized value. Default is False.

parameter.name: ResetDamage
parameter.semantics: Optional: Indicate if damage state of the entity should be reset to last initialized value. Default is False.

parameter.name: ResetSpatial
parameter.semantics: Optional: Indicate if spatial state of the entity should be reset to last initialized value. Default is False.

interactionClass.name: Aggregate
interactionClass.semantics: Instructs a federate application modelling the `AggregateEntity` to perform aggregation of the `DisaggregatedEntities`.

interactionClass.name: Disaggregate
interactionClass.semantics: Instructs a federate application to disaggregate the indicated `AggregateEntity`.

parameter.name: Formation
parameter.semantics: The formation of the disaggregated units.

interactionClass.name: Divide
interactionClass.semantics: Instructs a federate application to divide the `AggregateEntity` into multiple simulated entities.

parameter.name: Equipment
parameter.semantics: Optional. Amount of equipment of different type and health status to be divided.

parameter.name: Personnel
parameter.semantics: Optional. Amount of personnel of different type and health status to be divided.

parameter.name: Supplies
parameter.semantics: Optional. Amount of supplies to divide.

parameter.name: RegisterPhysicalEntities
parameter.semantics: Optional. If true, all Equipment of type Platform and Lifeform are published as individual objects in the federation.

parameter.name: Formation
parameter.semantics: The formation of the divided units.

interactionClass.name: Merge
interactionClass.semantics: Instructs a federate application to merge an `AggregateEntity` with divided entities.

parameter.name: DividedEntities
parameter.semantics: Required. A subset of identifiers from the DividedEntities attribute of the referenced AggregateEntity. The set of identifiers indicates which divided entities to merge with the AggregateEntity.

interactionClass.name: ChangeSuperiorUnit
interactionClass.semantics: Request a change in the organizational structure. The federate with the primary responsibility of the referenced entity (OrganizationElement) should if possible update the `SuperiorUnit` relationship.

parameter.name: SuperiorUnit
parameter.semantics: Required: Reference to a Unit for which the referenced entity (OrganizationElement) is requested to relate to as a subunit/equipment.

interactionClass.name: CBRN_Release
interactionClass.semantics: Communicates information associated with the release of hazardous agent.

parameter.name: Agent
parameter.semantics: The type of released CBRN hazardous agent.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: Initial location of the release in the geocentric location system.

parameter.name: Mass
parameter.semantics: Total released agent mass in kg.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: Duration the release takes place.

parameter.name: ReleaseSize
parameter.semantics: The initial size of the release including initial Gaussian sigmas of the released puff and mean & variance of released particles.

parameter.name: ReleaseDynamics
parameter.semantics: Temperature differance and density ratio of released material relative to the atmosphere.

parameter.name: ReleaseVelocity
parameter.semantics: Velocity of the source term.

interactionClass.name: ETR_SensorEvent
interactionClass.semantics: A sensor event such as a detection, track or alarm.

parameter.name: ProducingEntity
parameter.semantics: Optional: Reference to an entity with a sensor producing the sensor event. Default is no specific entity referenced.

interactionClass.name: CBRN_SensorUpdate
interactionClass.semantics: Sends information about the current state of a previously registered CBRN sensor.

parameter.name: Agent
parameter.semantics: Required: Type of the agent.

parameter.name: Concentration
parameter.semantics: Required: Mean Concentration in kg m-3.

interactionClass.name: CBRN_DetectorAlarm
interactionClass.semantics: Represents the alarm trigger of a previously registered CBRN detector.

parameter.name: Agent
parameter.semantics: Enumeration representation of the agent.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: Required: Location of the detection (location of Detector)

interactionClass.name: EntitySensorUpdate
interactionClass.semantics: Report on a unit's awareness of spotted entities.

parameter.name: Tracks
parameter.semantics: Required. Spotted entities at the time specified in the parameter 'When'.

parameter.name: SensorType
parameter.semantics: Required. The type of the sensor that detected the entities.

interactionClass.name: ETR_Report
interactionClass.semantics: A base interaction class for more specialized report interaction classes. The inherited parameter `Time is required.`

parameter.name: CommunicationNetworks
parameter.semantics: Optional. Reference to communication networks (NETN-COM) used to transfer report messages. If not provided, the report transmission should not be modelled and federates should receive and act on the task messages directly.

parameter.name: ReportId
parameter.semantics: Required: Unique identifier for the report itself.

parameter.name: ReportingEntity
parameter.semantics: Required: The entity sending the report.

parameter.name: Receiver
parameter.semantics: Optional: The indended receiver of the message if directed to a specific unit or simulated entity. If not provided, the report is modeled as broadcasted on the entity's default C2 or Battle Management System network.

parameter.name: TimeStamp
parameter.semantics: Required: The time when the report was created.

parameter.name: Comments
parameter.semantics: Optional. Any additional comments associated with the report.

interactionClass.name: HazardObservation
interactionClass.semantics: Observation of a dangerous area.

parameter.name: Area
parameter.semantics: Required: The estimated area affected by the hazard.

parameter.name: HazardType
parameter.semantics: Required: The type of hazard observed.

interactionClass.name: ObservationReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report on a unit's observation of a simulated entity. Based on SISO C2SIM standard ontology for representation of Observation Reports.

parameter.name: ObservedEntity
parameter.semantics: Required: The unique identifier of the observed entity

parameter.name: ObservationTime
parameter.semantics: Required: The time when the observation was made.

parameter.name: IdentificationLevel
parameter.semantics: Optional. The identification level of spotted entities.

parameter.name: ConfidenceLevel
parameter.semantics: Optional:

parameter.name: SensorType
parameter.semantics: Optional: The type of sensor that is the primary source of the report.

parameter.name: UncertaintyInterval
parameter.semantics: Optional

parameter.name: Activity
parameter.semantics: Optional: The current activity of the entity. (Fromm NETN-Base) Default value: Moving (213)

parameter.name: Health
parameter.semantics: Optional: Observed strength of an entity expressed as a percentage of the perceived normal strength.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: Optional: Observed location where the entity were spotted

parameter.name: Heading
parameter.semantics: Optional: Observed heading of spotted entity.

parameter.name: Speed
parameter.semantics: Optional: Observed speed of the entity (m/s).

parameter.name: HostilityStatus
parameter.semantics: Optional: Perceived hostility of the observed entity.

parameter.name: Marking
parameter.semantics: Optional: Observed marking on the entity.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.semantics: Optional: Perceived name of the observed entity.

parameter.name: Side
parameter.semantics: Optional: Perceived force identifier of the observed entity.

parameter.name: Equipment
parameter.semantics: Optional: Observed supplies and equipment.

parameter.name: Symbol
parameter.semantics: Optional: Symbol identifier for the entity.

interactionClass.name: PositionStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report on an entity's own position, speed, and heading.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Required. Position of the entity at the specified time.

parameter.name: Heading
parameter.semantics: Required. Heading of the entity. [0,360). Default = 0. True North.

parameter.name: Speed
parameter.semantics: Required. Speed of the entity.

interactionClass.name: DamageStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report on a unit's damage status.

parameter.name: DamageType
parameter.semantics: Required. Damage state of the reported entity.

interactionClass.name: ResourceStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report on a unit's remaining amount of resources.

parameter.name: Resource
parameter.semantics: Required. The type of resource and remaining quantity.

interactionClass.name: UnderAttackStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report from a unit that it is under attack.

parameter.name: FromDirection
parameter.semantics: Required. The direction to the attacking entity [0,360). Default = 0. True North.

parameter.name: Severeness
parameter.semantics: Required. Severeness of the attack upon the reporting entity.

interactionClass.name: InWeaponRangeReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report on a unit's ability to reach specific targets with its weapon systems.

parameter.name: WeaponType
parameter.semantics: Required. The type of weapon that is in range.

parameter.name: EntitiesInWeaponRange
parameter.semantics: Required. Reference to entities in weapon range.

interactionClass.name: SMC_FederateControl
interactionClass.semantics: Base class for all control actions directed to a specific federate. The inherited NETN-BASE `UniqueId` parameter matches this interaction with a corresponding `SMC_Response`. Before sending this interaction, use the `SMC_Service` object attribute `SupportedActions` to determine if the referenced federate supports the action.

parameter.name: Federate
parameter.semantics: Required: The federate intended as the receiver of this control action.

interactionClass.name: TaskDelegation
interactionClass.semantics: Request a specific federate application to execute a task. If the delegated task is accepted, a `DelegatedTask` object is created in the federation to track the progress of task execution.

parameter.name: TaskDefinition
parameter.semantics: Required. Definition of the task.

parameter.name: Entity
parameter.semantics: Required: The entity to perform the task.

interactionClass.name: METOC_Request
interactionClass.semantics: A request to a specified METOC Service to provide METOC data for a specific geographical reference. The request can result in either a response interaction including the requested data or registration of an EnvironmentCondition object for continuous updates.

parameter.name: GeoReference
parameter.semantics: Optional. Geographical reference. If not provided, the request is for a global environmental condition.

parameter.name: UpdateAsObject
parameter.semantics: Optional. Indicates if the service is requested to represent the environmental condition as an EnvironmentCondition object instance. The default is False.

interactionClass.name: RequestWeatherCondition
interactionClass.semantics: Request for general weather data.

interactionClass.name: RequestLandSurfaceCondition
interactionClass.semantics: Request for land surface condition data.

interactionClass.name: RequestTroposphereLayerCondition
interactionClass.semantics: Request for tropospheric environment condition data.

parameter.name: Layer
parameter.semantics: Optional. A description of a layer for the request of layered conditions troposphere environment condition. Default is the entire volume of air in the identified layer.

interactionClass.name: RequestWaterSurfaceCondition
interactionClass.semantics: Request for water surface condition data.

interactionClass.name: RequestSubsurfaceLayerCondition
interactionClass.semantics: Request for sub-surface condition data.

parameter.name: Layer
parameter.semantics: Optional. A description of a layer for the request of layered subsurface environment conditions. Default is the entire body of water in the identified layer.

interactionClass.name: AcquireModellingResponsibility
interactionClass.semantics: Trigger the specified federate to initiate a transfer of modelling responsibility for the specified entity.

parameter.name: Entity
parameter.semantics: Required: Reference to the object which is to be transferred.

interactionClass.name: ETR_TaskStatus
interactionClass.semantics: A management task report regarding the status of a specific task assigned to an entity. The inherited parameter `Time is required.`

parameter.name: Task
parameter.semantics: Required. Reference to the task associated with the report.

parameter.name: TaskStatus
parameter.semantics: Required. The status of the task.

interactionClass.name: SMC_FederationControl
interactionClass.semantics: Base class for all control actions applicable to all federates in the federation. The inherited NETN-BASE `UniqueId` parameter is used to match this interaction with a corresponding `SMC_Response`.

interactionClass.name: ResendSensorUpdates
interactionClass.semantics: Request all sensor services to resend their latest sensor updates.

interactionClass.name: SMC_Response
interactionClass.semantics: The response indicates whether the related action was accepted or rejected/failed by a federate. A single response per sent action is expected.

parameter.name: Action
parameter.semantics: Required: Reference to the control action this is a response to. The reference corresponds to the NETN-BASE `UniqueId` parameter of the control action interaction.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.semantics: Required: Indicates success or failure of a corresponding control action.

interactionClass.name: METOC_Response
interactionClass.semantics: A response to a request for METOC data.

parameter.name: GeoReference
parameter.semantics: GeoReferenceVariant|Optional. Geographical reference. The default is global.

parameter.name: EnvironmentObject
parameter.semantics: Optional. Reference to an existing environment condition if the corresponding request includes UpdateAsObject set to true.

interactionClass.name: WeatherCondition
interactionClass.semantics: Response with the general weather condition data.

parameter.name: Temperature
parameter.semantics: Optional. The average temperature in the region/location.

parameter.name: Wind
parameter.semantics: Optional. The average wind speed and direction in the region/location.

parameter.name: Precipitation
parameter.semantics: Optional. The average precipitation intensity in the region/location.

parameter.name: Haze
parameter.semantics: Optional. The average haze density in the region/location,

parameter.name: Humidity
parameter.semantics: Optional. The average humidity in the region/location.

parameter.name: BarometricPressure
parameter.semantics: Optional. The average barometric pressure in millibar or hectopascal (1 mbar = 1hPa) in the region/location.

parameter.name: VisibilityRange
parameter.semantics: Optional. The average distance at which the human eye in the region/location discerns an object or light.

interactionClass.name: LandSurfaceCondition
interactionClass.semantics: Response with the condition for the land surface.

parameter.name: Snow
parameter.semantics: Optional. Average snow depth and density in the region/location.

parameter.name: Moisture
parameter.semantics: Optional. Maximum surface moisture in the region/location.

parameter.name: IceCondition
parameter.semantics: Optional. The most severe ice conditions in the region/location.

interactionClass.name: TroposphereLayerCondition
interactionClass.semantics: Response specifying the environmental condition in a volume of air.

parameter.name: Cloud
parameter.semantics: Optional. Cloud cover.

interactionClass.name: WaterSurfaceCondition
interactionClass.semantics: Response specifying the environmental condition in a volume of air.

parameter.name: SeaState
parameter.semantics: Optional. Sea state data.

parameter.name: Salinity
parameter.semantics: Optional. Salinity in the surface water.

parameter.name: Tide
parameter.semantics: Optional. The height relative to the MSL.

parameter.name: Ice
parameter.semantics: Optional. Ice conditions on the water surface.

parameter.name: Current
parameter.semantics: Optional. Surface water Current direction and speed. N/A if Ice

parameter.name: Wave
parameter.semantics: Optional. Surface Wave data. N/A if Ice

parameter.name: Swell
parameter.semantics: Optional. Surface water Swell data. N/A if Ice

interactionClass.name: SubsurfaceLayerCondition
interactionClass.semantics: Response specifying the subsurface body of water condition data.

parameter.name: Temperature
parameter.semantics: Optional. The average temperature in the body of water.

parameter.name: Current
parameter.semantics: Optional. The average current direction and speed in the body of water.

parameter.name: Salinity
parameter.semantics: Optional. The average salinity in the body of water.

parameter.name: BottomType
parameter.semantics: Optional. The type of sediment on the sea floor. The default is 0 (NoSediment).

interactionClass.name: Collision
interactionClass.semantics: The act or instance of coming together with solid impact.

parameter.name: CollidingObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the object that the issuing object has collided with.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectMass
parameter.semantics: The mass of the issuing object.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectVelocityVector
parameter.semantics: The velocity vector of the issuing object at the moment of impact.

parameter.name: CollisionType
parameter.semantics: The type of collision.

parameter.name: CollisionLocation
parameter.semantics: The location of the collision relative to the object that the issuing object has collided with.

parameter.name: EventIdentifier
parameter.semantics: An ID assigned by the issuing object to associate related collision events.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the object that has detected the collision and issued the collision interaction.

interactionClass.name: CollisionElastic
interactionClass.semantics: The act or instance of coming together with solid impact in an elastic manner. An elastic collision allows a higher fidelity collision to be modeled, taking into account linear and rotational momentum transfer, variable elasticity, and momentum transfer that is dependent on surface orientation.

parameter.name: CoefficientOfRestitution
parameter.semantics: The degree that energy is conserved in a collision.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXX
parameter.semantics: X-X Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXY
parameter.semantics: X-Y Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXZ
parameter.semantics: X-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultYY
parameter.semantics: Y-Y Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultYZ
parameter.semantics: Y-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultZZ
parameter.semantics: Z-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: UnitSurfaceNormal
parameter.semantics: The normal vector to the surface at the point of collision detection.

interactionClass.name: EnvironmentObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: A base interaction for modifying instances of point, linear and areal environment object classes.

parameter.name: ObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies this EnvironmentObject instance (point, linear or areal)

parameter.name: ReferencedObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the Synthetic Environment object instance to which this EnvironmentObject instance is associated

parameter.name: ForceIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the force that created or modified this EnvironmentObject instance

parameter.name: ObjectType
parameter.semantics: Identifies the type of this EnvironmentObject instance

parameter.name: RequestingIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the simulation application sending the EnvironmentObjectTransaction interaction

parameter.name: ReceivingIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the simulation application receiving the EnvironmentObjectTransaction interaction

interactionClass.name: ArealObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for modifying instances of the ArealObject class.

parameter.name: PointsData
parameter.semantics: Specifies the physical location (a collection of points) that defines the object

parameter.name: PercentComplete
parameter.semantics: Specifies the percent completion of the object

parameter.name: DamagedAppearance
parameter.semantics: Specifies the damaged appearance of the object

parameter.name: ObjectPreDistributed
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was created before the start of the exercise

parameter.name: Deactivated
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object has been deactivated (it has ceased to exist in the synthetic environment)

parameter.name: Smoking
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is smoking (creating a smoke plume)

parameter.name: Flaming
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is flaming

interactionClass.name: OtherArealObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the OtherArealObject class.

interactionClass.name: MinefieldObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the MinefieldObject class.

parameter.name: BreachedStatus
parameter.semantics: Specifies the breached appearance of the minefield object

parameter.name: MineCount
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of mines in the minefield

interactionClass.name: LinearObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for modifying instances of the LinearObject class.

interactionClass.name: BreachableLinearObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BreachableLinearObject class.

parameter.name: SegmentRecords
parameter.semantics: Specifies a breachable linear object

interactionClass.name: BreachObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BreachObject class.

parameter.name: SegmentRecords
parameter.semantics: Specifies a breach linear object

interactionClass.name: ExhaustSmokeObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the ExhaustSmokeObject class.

parameter.name: SegmentRecords
parameter.semantics: Specifies an exhaust smoke linear object

interactionClass.name: OtherLinearObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the OtherLinearObject class.

interactionClass.name: MinefieldLaneMarkerObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the MinefieldLaneMarkerObject class.

parameter.name: SegmentRecords
parameter.semantics: Specifies a minefield lane marker linear object

interactionClass.name: PointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for modifying instances of the PointObject class.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: Specifies the location of the object based on x, y and z coordinates

parameter.name: Orientation
parameter.semantics: Specifies the angles of rotation around the coordinate axis between the object's attitude and the reference coordinate system axes ; these are calculated as the Tait-Bryan Euler angles, specifying the successive rotations needed to transform from the world coordinate system to the object coordinate system

parameter.name: PercentComplete
parameter.semantics: Specifies the percent completion of the object

parameter.name: DamagedAppearance
parameter.semantics: Specifies the damaged appearance of the object

parameter.name: ObjectPreDistributed
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was created before the start of the exercise

parameter.name: Deactivated
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object has been deactivated (it has ceased to exist in the synthetic environment)

parameter.name: Smoking
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is smoking (creating a smoke plume)

parameter.name: Flaming
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is flaming

interactionClass.name: BreachablePointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BreachablePointObject class.

parameter.name: BreachedStatus
parameter.semantics: Specifies the breached appearance of the object

interactionClass.name: BurstPointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BurstPointObject class.

parameter.name: PercentOpacity
parameter.semantics: Specifies the opacity of the smoke

parameter.name: CylinderSize
parameter.semantics: Specifies the radius of the cylinder approximating an individual smoke burst ; for multiple bursts, the center bottom of each cylinder is calculated based on the model used to represent the multiple bursts

parameter.name: CylinderHeight
parameter.semantics: Specifies the height of the cylinder approximating an individual smoke burst ; for multiple bursts, the center bottom of each cylinder is calculated based on the model used to represent the multiple bursts

parameter.name: NumberOfBursts
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of bursts in the instance of tactical smoke

parameter.name: ChemicalContent
parameter.semantics: Specifies the chemical content of the smoke

interactionClass.name: CraterObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the CraterObject class.

parameter.name: CraterSize
parameter.semantics: Specifies the diameter of the crater, where the center of the crater is at the point object location

interactionClass.name: OtherPointObjectTransaction
